word.kjv: Behold, he putteth no trust in his saints; yea, the heavens are not clean in his sight.
word.thailand: ดูเถิด พระเจ้ามิได้ทรงวางใจในวิสุทธิชนของพระองค์ ใช่แล้ว ในสายพระเนตรพระองค์ ฟ้าสวรรค์ก็ไม่สะอาด
word.spanish1909: He aquí que en sus santos no confía, Y ni los cielos son limpios delante de sus ojos:
word.latinvulgate: Ecce inter sanctos ejus nemo immutabilis, et cæli non sunt mundi in conspectu ejus.
word.italian1927: Ecco, Iddio non si fida nemmeno de’ suoi santi, i cieli non son puri agli occhi suoi;
word.german1912: Siehe, unter seinen Heiligen ist keiner ohne Tadel, und die im Himmel sind nicht rein vor ihm.
word.french1910: Si Dieu n'a pas confiance en ses saints, Si les cieux ne sont pas purs devant lui,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神不信任他的眾天使，在他看來，諸天也不潔淨，
word.korean: 하나님은 그 거룩한 자들을 믿지 아니 하시나니 하늘이라도 그의 보시기에 부정하거든
word.tagalog: Narito, siya'y hindi naglalagak ng tiwala sa kaniyang mga banal; Oo, ang langit ay hindi malinis sa kaniyang paningin.
word.maori: Nana, kahore ia e whakawhirinaki ki ana mea tapu; kahore hoki nga rangi e ma ki tana titiro.
word.cebuano: Ania karon, siya dili mosalig sa iyang mga balaan. Oo, ang kalangitan dili mahinlo sa iyang mga mata:
word.hebrew: טו  הן בקדשו לא יאמין    ושמים לא-זכו בעיניו
word.hebrewmodern: הן בקדשו לא יאמין ושמים לא זכו בעיניו׃
word.greekot: εἰ κατὰ ἁγίων οὐ πιστεύει οὐρανὸς δὲ οὐ καθαρὸς ἐναντίον αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: Also now, behold, my witness is in heaven, and my record is on high.
word.thailand: ดูเถิด เดี๋ยวนี้เองพยานของข้าก็อยู่บนสวรรค์ และพระองค์ผู้รับรองข้าก็อยู่ในที่สูง
word.spanish1909: Mas he aquí que en los cielos está mi testigo, Y mi testimonio en las alturas.
word.latinvulgate: Terra, ne operias sanguinem meum, neque inveniat in te locum latendi clamor meus :
word.italian1927: Già fin d’ora, ecco, il mio Testimonio è in cielo, il mio Garante è nei luoghi altissimi.
word.german1912: Auch siehe da, meine Zeuge ist mein Himmel; und der mich kennt, ist in der Höhe.
word.french1910: Déjà maintenant, mon témoin est dans le ciel, Mon témoin est dans les lieux élevés.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 現今，在天上有我的見證，在高天之上，有我的證人。
word.korean: 지금 나의 증인이 하늘에 계시고 나의 보인이 높은데 계시니라
word.tagalog: Kahit na ngayon, narito, ang aking saksi ay nasa langit, at siyang nananagot sa akin ay nasa kaitaasan.
word.maori: Kei te rangi nei ano inaianei te kaiwhakaatu o taku, kei te wahi i runga toku kaititiro.
word.cebuano: Bisan ngani karon tan-awa, ang akong saksi atua sa langit, Ug ang nagapamatuod kanako atua sa kinahitas-an.
word.hebrew: יט  גם-עתה הנה-בשמים עדי    ושהדי במרמים
word.hebrewmodern: גם עתה הנה בשמים עדי ושהדי במרומים׃
word.greekot: καὶ νῦν ἰδοὺ ἐν οὐρανοῖς ὁ μάρτυς μου ὁ δὲ συνίστωρ μου ἐν ὑψίστοις

word.kjv: Though his excellency mount up to the heavens, and his head reach unto the clouds;
word.thailand: แม้ความสูงของเขาเด่นขึ้นไปถึงฟ้าสวรรค์ และศีรษะของเขาไปถึงหมู่เมฆ
word.spanish1909: Si subiere su altivez hasta el cielo, Y su cabeza tocare en las nubes,
word.latinvulgate: Si ascenderit usque ad cælum superbia ejus, et caput ejus nubes tetigerit,
word.italian1927: Quando la sua altezza giungesse fino al cielo ed il suo capo toccasse le nubi,
word.german1912: Wenngleich seine Höhe in den Himmel reicht und sein Haupt an die Wolken rührt,
word.french1910: Quand il s'élèverait jusqu'aux cieux, Et que sa tête toucherait aux nues,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 雖然他的高貴上達於天，他的頭直插雲霄，
word.korean: 그 높기가 하늘에 닿고 그 머리가 구름에 미칠지라도
word.tagalog: Bagaman ang kaniyang karilagan ay napaiilanglang hanggang sa langit, at ang kaniyang ulo ay umaabot hanggang sa mga alapaap;
word.maori: Ahakoa eke noa tona nui ki nga rangi, a pa atu tona mahunga ki nga kapua;
word.cebuano: Bisan ang gitas-on niya motupong sa kalangitan, Ug ang iyang ulo mosangko sa kapanganoran;
word.hebrew: ו  אם-יעלה לשמים שיאו    וראשו לעב יגיע
word.hebrewmodern: אם יעלה לשמים שיאו וראשו לעב יגיע׃
word.greekot: ἐὰν ἀναβῇ εἰς οὐρανὸν αὐτοῦ τὰ δῶρα ἡ δὲ θυσία αὐτοῦ νεφῶν ἅψηται

word.kjv: The heaven shall reveal his iniquity; and the earth shall rise up against him.
word.thailand: ฟ้าสวรรค์จะสำแดงความชั่วช้าของเขา และแผ่นดินโลกจะลุกขึ้นปรักปรำเขา
word.spanish1909: Los cielos descubrirán su iniquidad, Y la tierra se levantará contra él.
word.latinvulgate: Revelabunt cæli iniquitatem ejus, et terra consurget adversus eum.
word.italian1927: Il cielo rivelerà la sua iniquità, e la terra insorgerà contro di lui.
word.german1912: Der Himmel wird seine Missetat eröffnen, und die Erde wird sich gegen ihn setzen.
word.french1910: Les cieux dévoileront son iniquité, Et la terre s'élèvera contre lui.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 天必顯露他的罪孽，地要興起來攻擊他，
word.korean: 하늘이 그의 죄악을 드러낼 것이요 땅이 일어나 그를 칠 것인즉
word.tagalog: Ihahayag ng mga langit ang kaniyang kasamaan, at ang lupa ay babangon laban sa kaniya.
word.maori: Ka whakakitea mai tona he e nga rangi ka whakatika mai ano te whenua ki a ia.
word.cebuano: Ang mga langit magapadayag sa iyang kasal-anan, Ug ang yuta mobangon batok kaniya.
word.hebrew: כז  יגלו שמים עונו    וארץ מתקוממה לו
word.hebrewmodern: יגלו שמים עונו וארץ מתקוממה לו׃
word.greekot: ἀνακαλύψαι δὲ αὐτοῦ ὁ οὐρανὸς τὰς ἀνομίας γῆ δὲ ἐπανασταίη αὐτῷ

word.kjv: Is not God in the height of heaven? and behold the height of the stars, how high they are!
word.thailand: พระเจ้ามิได้ทรงสถิตอยู่ ณ ที่สูงในฟ้าสวรรค์หรือ ดูดาวที่สูงที่สุดเถิด มันสูงจริงๆ
word.spanish1909: ¿No está Dios en la altura de los cielos? Mira lo encumbrado de las estrellas, cuán elevadas están.
word.latinvulgate: An non cogitas quod Deus excelsior cælo sit, et super stellarum verticem sublimetur ?
word.italian1927: Iddio non è egli lassù ne’ cieli? Guarda lassù le stelle eccelse, come stanno in alto!
word.german1912: Ist nicht Gott hoch droben im Himmel? Siehe, die Sterne an droben in der Höhe!
word.french1910: Dieu n'est-il pas en haut dans les cieux? Regarde le sommet des étoiles, comme il est élevé!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神不是高於諸天嗎？你看看最高的星星，多麼的高啊！
word.korean: 하나님이 높은 하늘에 계시지 아니하냐 ? 보라 ! 별의 높음이 얼마나 높은가
word.tagalog: Hindi ba ang Dios ay nasa kaitaasan ng langit? At, narito, ang kataasan ng mga bituin, pagkataastaas nila!
word.maori: He teka ianei kei te wahi tiketike o te rangi te Atua? Tirohia atu ano hoki a runga o nga whetu, to ratou teitei!
word.cebuano: Wala ba ang Dios sa kahitas-an sa langit? Ug ania, ang kinahitas-an sa mga bitoon pagkahalayo nila!
word.hebrew: יב  הלא-אלוה גבה שמים    וראה ראש כוכבים כי-רמו
word.hebrewmodern: הלא אלוה גבה שמים וראה ראש כוכבים כי רמו׃
word.greekot: μὴ οὐχὶ ὁ τὰ ὑψηλὰ ναίων ἐφορᾷ τοὺς δὲ ὕβρει φερομένους ἐταπείνωσεν

word.kjv: Thick clouds are a covering to him, that he seeth not; and he walketh in the circuit of heaven.
word.thailand: เมฆทึบคลุมพระองค์ไว้ พระองค์ทรงมองอะไรไม่เห็น และพระองค์ทรงดำเนินโดยรอบบนพื้นฟ้า'
word.spanish1909: Las nubes son su escondedero, y no ve; Y por el circuito del cielo se pasea.
word.latinvulgate: Nubes latibulum ejus, nec nostra considerat, et circa cardines cæli perambulat.
word.italian1927: Fitte nubi lo coprono e nulla vede; egli passeggia sulla vòlta de’ cieli".
word.german1912: Die Wolken sind die Vordecke, und er sieht nicht; er wandelt im Umkreis des Himmels."
word.french1910: Les nuées l'enveloppent, et il ne voit rien; Il ne parcourt que la voûte des cieux.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 密雲把他遮蓋，使他不能看見我們；他在天上的圓圈上面走來走去。’
word.korean: 빽빽한 구름이 그를 가리운즉 그가 보지 못하시고 궁창으로 걸어다니실 뿐이라 하는구나
word.tagalog: Masinsing alapaap ang tumatakip sa kaniya, na siya'y hindi nakakakita; at siya'y lumalakad sa balantok ng langit.
word.maori: Ko tona wahi ngaro ko nga kapua matotoru, te kite ia; kei te taiawhio ano ia i nga rangi.
word.cebuano: Mga mabagang panganod nagatabon man kaniya, busa siya dili makakita, Ug siya nagalakaw sa dapit nga hawanan sa langit.
word.hebrew: יד  עבים סתר-לו ולא יראה    וחוג שמים יתהלך
word.hebrewmodern: עבים סתר לו ולא יראה וחוג שמים יתהלך׃
word.greekot: νέφη ἀποκρυφὴ αὐτοῦ καὶ οὐχ ὁραθήσεται καὶ γῦρον οὐρανοῦ διαπορεύσεται

word.kjv: The pillars of heaven tremble and are astonished at his reproof.
word.thailand: เสาฟ้าก็หวั่นไหวและประหลาดใจเมื่อพระองค์ทรงขนาบ
word.spanish1909: Las columnas del cielo tiemblan, Y se espantan de su reprensión.
word.latinvulgate: Columnæ cæli contremiscunt, et pavent ad nutum ejus.
word.italian1927: Le colonne del cielo sono scosse, e tremano alla sua minaccia.
word.german1912: Die Säulen des Himmels zittern und entsetzen sich vor seinem Schelten.
word.french1910: Les colonnes du ciel s'ébranlent, Et s'étonnent à sa menace.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 天的柱子都因他的斥責震動驚奇；
word.korean: 그가 꾸짖으신즉 하늘 기둥이 떨며 놀라느니라
word.tagalog: Ang mga haligi ng langit ay nagsisipanginig. At nangatitigilan sa kaniyang saway.
word.maori: Wiri ana nga pou o te rangi, miharo ana ki tana whakatupehupehu.
word.cebuano: Ang mga haligi sa langit nangauyog Ug nanghibulong sa iyang pagbadlong.
word.hebrew: יא  עמודי שמים ירופפו    ויתמהו מגערתו
word.hebrewmodern: עמודי שמים ירופפו ויתמהו מגערתו׃
word.greekot: στῦλοι οὐρανοῦ ἐπετάσθησαν καὶ ἐξέστησαν ἀπὸ τῆς ἐπιτιμήσεως αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: By his spirit he hath garnished the heavens; his hand hath formed the crooked serpent.
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงตกแต่งฟ้าสวรรค์ด้วยพระวิญญาณของพระองค์ พระหัตถ์ของพระองค์ทรงสร้างพญานาคที่ขด
word.spanish1909: Su espíritu adornó los cielos; Su mano crió la serpiente tortuosa.
word.latinvulgate: Spiritus ejus ornavit cælos, et obstetricante manu ejus, eductus est coluber tortuosus.
word.italian1927: Al suo soffio il cielo torna sereno, la sua mano trafigge il drago fuggente.
word.german1912: Am Himmel wird's schön durch seinen Wind, und seine Hand durchbohrt die flüchtige Schlange.
word.french1910: Son souffle donne au ciel la sérénité, Sa main transperce le serpent fuyard.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他以自己的氣使天晴朗，他的手刺穿逃跑的蛇。
word.korean: 그 신으로 하늘을 단장하시고 손으로 날랜 뱀을 찌르시나니
word.tagalog: Sa pamamagitan ng kaniyang Espiritu ay ginayakan niya ang langit; sinaksak ng kaniyang mga kamay ang maliksing ahas.
word.maori: Na tona wairua i whakapaipai nga rangi; na tona ringa i wero te nakahi tere.
word.cebuano: Sa iyang Espiritu siya nagadayandayan sa kalangitan; Ang iyang kamot maoy nagduslak sa bitin nga matulin.
word.hebrew: יג  ברוחו שמים שפרה    חללה ידו נחש ברח
word.hebrewmodern: ברוחו שמים שפרה חללה ידו נחש בריח׃
word.greekot: κλεῖθρα δὲ οὐρανοῦ δεδοίκασιν αὐτόν προστάγματι δὲ ἐθανάτωσεν δράκοντα ἀποστάτην

word.kjv: For he looketh to the ends of the earth, and seeth under the whole heaven;
word.thailand: เพราะพระองค์ทอดพระเนตรไปถึงที่สุดปลายแผ่นดินโลก และทรงเห็นทุกสิ่งที่ใต้ฟ้าสวรรค์
word.spanish1909: Porque él mira hasta los fines de la tierra, Y ve debajo de todo el cielo.
word.latinvulgate: Ipse enim fines mundi intuetur, et omnia quæ sub cælo sunt respicit.
word.italian1927: perché il suo sguardo giunge sino alle estremità della terra, perch’egli vede tutto quel ch’è sotto i cieli.
word.german1912: Denn er sieht die Enden der Erde und schaut alles, was unter dem Himmel ist.
word.french1910: Car il voit jusqu'aux extrémités de la terre, Il aperçoit tout sous les cieux.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為他察看全世界，遍觀全地。
word.korean: 이는 그가 땅 끝까지 감찰하시며 온 천하를 두루 보시며
word.tagalog: Sapagka't tumitingin siya hanggang sa mga wakas ng lupa, at nakikita ang silong ng buong langit;
word.maori: E titiro ana hoki ia ki nga pito o te whenua, e kite ana ia i nga mea i raro i te rangi, a puta noa;
word.cebuano: Kay siya nagatan-aw ngadto sa mga kinatumyan sa yuta, Ug nagasud-ong sa ilalum sa tibook langit;
word.hebrew: כד  כי-הוא לקצות-הארץ יביט    תחת כל-השמים יראה
word.hebrewmodern: כי הוא לקצות הארץ יביט תחת כל השמים יראה׃
word.greekot: αὐτὸς γὰρ τὴν ὑπ' οὐρανὸν πᾶσαν ἐφορᾷ εἰδὼς τὰ ἐν τῇ γῇ πάντα ἃ ἐποίησεν

word.kjv: Look unto the heavens, and see; and behold the clouds which are higher than thou.
word.thailand: จงมองดูท้องฟ้าเถิด ดูเมฆซึ่งอยู่สูงกว่าท่าน
word.spanish1909: Mira á los cielos, y ve, Y considera que las nubes son más altas que tú.
word.latinvulgate: Suspice cælum, et intuere : et contemplare æthera quod altior te sit.
word.italian1927: Considera i cieli, e vedi! guarda le nuvole, come sono più in alto di te!
word.german1912: Schaue gen Himmel und siehe; und schau an die Wolken, daß sie dir zu hoch sind.
word.french1910: Considère les cieux, et regarde! Vois les nuées, comme elles sont au-dessus de toi!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你要往天仰望觀看，細看高過你的雲天。
word.korean: 너는 하늘을 우러러 보라 ! 네 위의 높은 궁창을 바라보라
word.tagalog: Tumingala ka sa mga langit at iyong tingnan; at masdan mo ang mga alapaap na lalong mataas kay sa iyo.
word.maori: Kia matatau atu tau titiro ki nga rangi; matakitakina atu hoki nga kapua e tiketike ake na i a koe.
word.cebuano: Humangad ka sa kalangitan, ug tuman-aw ka; Ug tan-awa ang mga langit nga labing hataas kay kanimo.
word.hebrew: ה  הבט שמים וראה    ושור שחקים גבהו ממך
word.hebrewmodern: הבט שמים וראה ושור שחקים גבהו ממך׃
word.greekot: ἀνάβλεψον εἰς τὸν οὐρανὸν καὶ ἰδέ κατάμαθε δὲ νέφη ὡς ὑψηλὰ ἀπὸ σοῦ

word.kjv: Who teacheth us more than the beasts of the earth, and maketh us wiser than the fowls of heaven?
word.thailand: ผู้ทรงสอนเรามากกว่าสอนสัตว์แห่งแผ่นดินโลก และทรงกระทำให้เราฉลาดกว่านกในฟ้าอากาศ'
word.spanish1909: Que nos enseña más que á las bestias de la tierra, Y nos hace sabios más que las aves del cielo?
word.latinvulgate: qui docet nos super jumenta terræ, et super volucres cæli erudit nos ?
word.italian1927: che ci fa più intelligenti delle bestie de’ campi e più savi degli uccelli del cielo?"
word.german1912: der uns klüger macht denn das Vieh auf Erden und weiser denn die Vögel unter dem Himmel?"
word.french1910: Qui nous instruit plus que les bêtes de la terre, Et nous donne l'intelligence plus qu'aux oiseaux du ciel?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他教導我們過於教導地上的走獸，使我們有智慧勝於空中的飛鳥。’
word.korean: (10절과 같음)
word.tagalog: Na siyang nagtuturo sa atin ng higit kay sa mga hayop sa lupa. At ginagawa tayong lalong pantas kay sa mga ibon sa himpapawid?
word.maori: E nui atu nei tana whakaako ki a tatou i tana ki nga kararehe o te whenua, nana hoki i nui ai o tatou mahara i o nga manu o te rangi?
word.cebuano: Nga nagatudlo kanato labaw kay sa kamananapan sa yuta, Ug naghimo kanato sa labing manggialamon kay sa kalanggaman sa langit?
word.hebrew: יא  מלפנו מבהמות ארץ    ומעוף השמים יחכמנו
word.hebrewmodern: מלפנו מבהמות ארץ ומעוף השמים יחכמנו׃
word.greekot: ὁ διορίζων με ἀπὸ τετραπόδων γῆς ἀπὸ δὲ πετεινῶν οὐρανοῦ

word.kjv: He directeth it under the whole heaven, and his lightning unto the ends of the earth.
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงปล่อยให้ไปทั่วใต้ฟ้าทั้งสิ้น และฟ้าแลบของพระองค์ไปถึงสุดปลายแผ่นดินโลก
word.spanish1909: Debajo de todos los cielos lo dirige, Y su luz hasta los fines de la tierra.
word.latinvulgate: Subter omnes cælos ipse considerat, et lumen illius super terminos terræ.
word.italian1927: Egli lo lancia sotto tutti i cieli e il suo lampo guizza fino ai lembi della terra.
word.german1912: Er läßt ihn hinfahren unter allen Himmeln, und sein Blitz scheint auf die Enden der Erde.
word.french1910: Il le fait rouler dans toute l'étendue des cieux, Et son éclair brille jusqu'aux extrémités de la terre.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他發雷聲響遍天下，也發電光閃到地極。
word.korean: 너는 대장부처럼 허리를 묶고 내가 네게 묻는 것을 대답할지니라
word.tagalog: Kaniyang ipinadadala sa silong ng buong langit, at ang kidlat niya'y sa mga wakas ng lupa.
word.maori: E whakatikaia atu ana e ia ki nga wahi katoa i raro i te rangi, ko tona uira hoki ki nga pito o te whenua.
word.cebuano: Kana iyang gipadala sa ilalum sa tibook nga langit, Ug ang iyang kilat ngadto sa mga kinatumyan sa yuta.
word.hebrew: ג  תחת-כל-השמים ישרהו    ואורו על-כנפות הארץ
word.hebrewmodern: תחת כל השמים ישרהו ואורו על כנפות הארץ׃
word.greekot: ὑποκάτω παντὸς τοῦ οὐρανοῦ ἀρχὴ αὐτοῦ καὶ τὸ φῶς αὐτοῦ ἐπὶ πτερύγων τῆς γῆς

word.kjv: Out of whose womb came the ice? and the hoary frost of heaven, who hath gendered it?
word.thailand: น้ำแข็งมาจากครรภ์ของผู้ใด ผู้ใดให้กำเนิดแก่ปุยน้ำค้างแข็งแห่งฟ้าสวรรค์
word.spanish1909: ¿De qué vientre salió el hielo? Y la escarcha del cielo, ¿quién la engendró?
word.latinvulgate: De cujus utero egressa est glacies ? et gelu de cælo quis genuit ?
word.italian1927: Dal seno di chi esce il ghiaccio, e la brina del cielo chi la dà alla luce?
word.german1912: Aus wes Leib ist das Eis gegangen, und wer hat den Reif unter dem Himmel gezeugt,
word.french1910: Du sein de qui sort la glace, Et qui enfante le frimas du ciel,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 冰出自誰的胎？天上的霜是誰所生的呢？
word.korean: 거기서 움킬만한 것을 살피나니 그 눈이 멀리 봄이며
word.tagalog: Sa kaninong bahay-bata nagmula ang hielo? At ang escarcha sa himpapawid, ay ipinanganak nino?
word.maori: I puta mai i roto i to wai kopu te huka tio? Ko te huka o te rangi, he whanau tena na wai?
word.cebuano: Kang kinsa bang taguangkan naggikan ang yelo? Ug ang tun-og sa gabii sa langit nga maputi kinsa ba ang nag-anak niini?
word.hebrew: כט  מבטן מי יצא הקרח    וכפר שמים מי ילדו
word.hebrewmodern: מבטן מי יצא הקרח וכפר שמים מי ילדו׃
word.greekot: ἐκ γαστρὸς δὲ τίνος ἐκπορεύεται ὁ κρύσταλλος πάχνην δὲ ἐν οὐρανῷ τίς τέτοκεν

word.kjv: Knowest thou the ordinances of heaven? canst thou set the dominion thereof in the earth?
word.thailand: เจ้ารู้กฎของฟ้าสวรรค์หรือเปล่า เจ้าตั้งฟ้าสวรรค์ให้ครอบครองแผ่นดินได้หรือ
word.spanish1909: ¿Supiste tú las ordenanzas de los cielos? ¿Dispondrás tú de su potestad en la tierra?
word.latinvulgate: Numquid nosti ordinem cæli, et pones rationem ejus in terra ?
word.italian1927: Conosci tu le leggi del cielo? e regoli tu il dominio di esso sulla terra?
word.german1912: Weißt du des Himmels Ordnungen, oder bestimmst du seine Herrschaft über die Erde?
word.french1910: Connais-tu les lois du ciel? Règles-tu son pouvoir sur la terre?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你曉得天的定例嗎？你能在地上建立天的權威嗎？
word.tagalog: Nalalaman mo ba ang mga alituntunin ng langit? Maitatatag mo ba ang kapangyarihan niyaon sa lupa?
word.maori: E mohio ana ranei koe ki nga tikanga o te rangi? Mau ranei e whai mana ai ki runga ki te whenua?
word.cebuano: Nahibalo ka ba sa mga tulomanon sa mga langit? Makahimo ka ba sa pagtukod sa gingharian niini diha sa yuta?
word.hebrew: לג  הידעת חקות שמים    אם-תשים משטרו בארץ
word.hebrewmodern: הידעת חקות שמים אם תשים משטרו בארץ׃
word.greekot: ἐπίστασαι δὲ τροπὰς οὐρανοῦ ἢ τὰ ὑπ' οὐρανὸν ὁμοθυμαδὸν γινόμενα

word.kjv: Who can number the clouds in wisdom? or who can stay the bottles of heaven,
word.thailand: ใครจะนับเมฆด้วยสติปัญญาได้ หรือใครจะเอียงถุงน้ำของท้องฟ้าได้
word.spanish1909: ¿Quién puso por cuenta los cielos con sabiduría? Y los odres de los cielos, ¿quién los hace parar,
word.latinvulgate: Quis enarrabit cælorum rationem, et concentum cæli quis dormire faciet ?
word.italian1927: Chi conta con sapienza le nubi? e gli otri del cielo chi li versa
word.german1912: Wer ist so weise, der die Wolken zählen könnte? Wer kann die Wasserschläuche am Himmel ausschütten,
word.french1910: Qui peut avec sagesse compter les nuages, Et verser les outres des cieux,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 塵土融合成團，土塊黏結在一起的時候，
word.tagalog: Sinong makabibilang ng mga alapaap sa pamamagitan ng karunungan? O sinong makatutuyo ng mga botelya ng langit,
word.maori: Ko wai te mea whakaaro nui hei tatau i nga kapua? Ko wai hei tahoro i nga ipu o te rangi?
word.cebuano: Kinsa ba ang makaihap sa mga panganod pinaagi sa kaalam? Kun kinsa ba ang arang makabubo sa mga botella sa langit,
word.hebrew: לז  מי-יספר שחקים בחכמה    ונבלי שמים מי ישכיב
word.hebrewmodern: מי יספר שחקים בחכמה ונבלי שמים מי ישכיב׃
word.greekot: τίς δὲ ὁ ἀριθμῶν νέφη σοφίᾳ οὐρανὸν δὲ εἰς γῆν ἔκλινεν

word.kjv: Who hath prevented me, that I should repay him? whatsoever is under the whole heaven is mine.
word.thailand: ใครเล่าที่จะขัดขวางเรา ซึ่งเราจะต้องตอบสนองเขา สิ่งใดๆที่อยู่ใต้ฟ้าสวรรค์ทั้งสิ้นก็เป็นของเรา
word.spanish1909: ¿Quién me ha anticipado, para que yo restituya? Todo lo que hay debajo del cielo es mío.
word.latinvulgate: De naribus ejus procedit fumus, sicut ollæ succensæ atque ferventis.
word.italian1927: (H41-3) Chi mi ha anticipato alcun che perch’io glielo debba rendere? Sotto tutti i cieli, ogni cosa è mia.
word.german1912: 41:3 Wer hat mir etwas zuvor getan, daß ich's ihm vergelte? Es ist mein, was unter allen Himmeln ist.
word.french1910: De qui suis-je le débiteur? Je le paierai. Sous le ciel tout m'appartient.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 誰先給了我，以致我要償還呢？天下萬物，都是我的。
word.korean: 이에 그의 모든 형제와 자매와 및 전에 알던 자들이 다 와서 그 집에서 그와 함께 식물을 먹고 여호와께서 그에게 내리신 모든 재앙에 대하여 그를 위하여 슬퍼하며 위로하고 각각 금 한 조각과 금고리 하나씩 주었더라
word.tagalog: Sinong naunang nagbigay sa akin upang aking bayaran siya? Anomang nasa silong ng buong langit ay akin.
word.maori: ¶ Ko wai te tangata nana te mea kua takoto wawe ki ahau, e whakautu ai ahau ki a ia? Ahakoa he aha te mea i raro i nga rangi, puta noa, naku katoa.
word.cebuano: Kinsa ba ang unang nakahatag kanako, aron unta ako magabalus kaniya? Bisan unsang butanga nga ania sa ilalum sa tibook langit, ako man.
word.hebrew: יא  מפיו לפידים יהלכו    כידודי אש יתמלטו
word.hebrewmodern: מי הקדימני ואשלם תחת כל השמים לי הוא׃
word.greekot: ἐκ στόματος αὐτοῦ ἐκπορεύονται λαμπάδες καιόμεναι καὶ διαρριπτοῦνται ἐσχάραι πυρός

word.kjv: He that sitteth in the heavens shall laugh: the Lord shall have them in derision.
word.thailand: พระองค์ผู้ประทับในสวรรค์จะทรงพระสรวล องค์พระผู้เป็นเจ้าจะทรงเย้ยหยันเขาเหล่านั้น
word.spanish1909: El que mora en los cielos se reirá; El Señor se burlará de ellos.
word.latinvulgate: Qui habitat in cælis irridebit eos, et Dominus subsannabit eos.
word.italian1927: Colui che siede ne’ cieli ne riderà; il Signore si befferà di loro.
word.german1912: Aber der im Himmel wohnt, lacht ihrer, und der HERR spottet ihrer.
word.french1910: Celui qui siège dans les cieux rit, Le Seigneur se moque d'eux.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 那坐在天上的必發笑，主必譏笑他們。
word.korean: 하늘에 계신 자가 웃으심이여 ! 주께서 저희를 비웃으시리로다
word.tagalog: Siyang nauupo sa kalangitan ay tatawa: ilalagay sila ng Panginoon sa kakutyaan.
word.maori: Ko ia kei te rangi e noho ana, ka kata ia: ka whakahi te Ariki ki a ratou.
word.cebuano: Siya nga nagalingkod sa kalangitan magakatawa: Ang Ginoo magahimo kanila nga yubitonon.
word.hebrew: ד  יושב בשמים ישחק    אדני ילעג-למו
word.hebrewmodern: יושב בשמים ישחק אדני ילעג למו׃
word.greekot: ὁ κατοικῶν ἐν οὐρανοῖς ἐκγελάσεται αὐτούς καὶ ὁ κύριος ἐκμυκτηριεῖ αὐτούς

word.kjv: O LORD our Lord, how excellent is thy name in all the earth! who hast set thy glory above the heavens.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์คือองค์พระผู้เป็นเจ้าของบรรดาข้าพระองค์ พระนามของพระองค์สูงส่งยิ่งนักทั่วทั้งแผ่นดินโลก พระองค์ผู้ทรงตั้งสง่าราศีของพระองค์ไว้เหนือฟ้าสวรรค์ทั้งหลาย
word.spanish1909: Al Músico principal: sobre Gittith: Salmo de David. OH Jehová, Señor nuestro, ­Cuán grande es tu nombre en toda la tierra, Que has puesto tu gloria sobre los cielos!
word.latinvulgate: In finem, pro torcularibus. Psalmus David.
word.italian1927: Al Capo de’ musici. Sulla Ghittea. Salmo di Davide. O Eterno, Signor nostro, quant’è magnifico il tuo nome in tutta la terra! O Tu che hai posta la tua maestà nei cieli.
word.german1912: Ein Psalm Davids, vorzusingen, auf der Gittith.  HERR, unser Herrscher, wie herrlich ist dein Name in allen Landen, du, den man lobt im Himmel!
word.french1910: Au chef des chantres. Sur la guitthith. Psaume de David. Eternel, notre Seigneur! Que ton nom est magnifique sur toute la terre! Ta majesté s'élève au-dessus des cieux.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 大衛的詩，交給詩班長，用“迦特”的樂器。耶和華我們的主啊！你的名在全地是多麼威嚴，你把你的榮美彰顯在天上。
word.korean: (다윗의 시. 영장으로 깃딧에 맞춘 노래) 여호와 우리 주여, 주의 이름이 온 땅에 어찌 그리 아름다운지요 주의 영광을 하늘 위에 두셨나이다
word.tagalog: Oh Panginoon, aming Panginoon, pagkarilag ng iyong pangalan sa buong lupa! na siyang naglagay ng inyong kaluwalhatian sa mga langit.
word.maori: ¶ Ki te tino kaiwhakatangi. Kititi. He himene na Rawiri. E Ihowa, e to matou Ariki, ano te nui o tou ingoa i te whenua katoa! Paku ana i a koe tou kororia ki runga ake i nga rangi!
word.cebuano: Oh Jehova nga Ginoo namo, Pagkahalangdon sa imong ngalan sa tibook nga yuta, Nga gibutang mo ang imong himaya sa ibabaw sa mga langit!
word.hebrew: א  למנצח על-הגתית    מזמור לדוד
word.hebrewmodern: למנצח על הגתית מזמור לדוד יהוה אדנינו מה אדיר שמך בכל הארץ אשר תנה הודך על השמים׃
word.greekot: εἰς τὸ τέλος ὑπὲρ τῶν ληνῶν ψαλμὸς τῷ δαυιδ

word.kjv: When I consider thy heavens, the work of thy fingers, the moon and the stars, which thou hast ordained;
word.thailand: เมื่อข้าพระองค์พิจารณาดูฟ้าสวรรค์อันเป็นฝีนิ้วพระหัตถ์ของพระองค์ ดวงจันทร์และดวงดาวซึ่งพระองค์ได้ทรงสถาปนาไว้
word.spanish1909: Cuando veo tus cielos, obra de tus dedos, La luna y las estrellas que tú formaste:
word.latinvulgate: Ex ore infantium et lactentium perfecisti laudem propter inimicos tuos, ut destruas inimicum et ultorem.
word.italian1927: Quand’io considero i tuoi cieli, opra delle tue dita, la luna e le stelle che tu hai disposte,
word.german1912: Wenn ich sehe die Himmel, deiner Finger Werk, den Mond und die Sterne, die du bereitet hast:
word.french1910: Quand je contemple les cieux, ouvrage de tes mains, La lune et les étoiles que tu as créées:
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我觀看你手所造的天，和你所安放的月亮和星星。
word.korean: 주의 손가락으로 만드신 주의 하늘과 주의 베풀어 두신 달과 별들을 내가 보오니
word.tagalog: Pagka binubulay ko ang iyong mga langit, ang gawa ng iyong mga daliri, ang buwan at ang mga bituin na iyong inayos;
word.maori: ¶ Ka titiro ahau ki au rangi, ki te mahi a ou maihao, ki te marama, ki nga whetu, i hanga nei e koe;
word.cebuano: Sa magapalandong ako sa imong mga langit, sa buhat sa imong mga tudlo, Sa bulan ug sa mga bitoon nga imong gibut-an;
word.hebrew: ג  מפי עוללים וינקים--    יסדת-עז למען צורריך    להשבית אויב ומתנקם
word.hebrewmodern: כי אראה שמיך מעשי אצבעתיך ירח וכוכבים אשר כוננתה׃
word.greekot: ἐκ στόματος νηπίων καὶ θηλαζόντων κατηρτίσω αἶνον ἕνεκα τῶν ἐχθρῶν σου τοῦ καταλῦσαι ἐχθρὸν καὶ ἐκδικητήν

word.kjv: The LORD is in his holy temple, the LORD's throne is in heaven: his eyes behold, his eyelids try, the children of men.
word.thailand: พระเยโฮวาห์ทรงสถิตในพระวิหารอันบริสุทธิ์ของพระองค์ พระที่นั่งของพระเยโฮวาห์อยู่บนฟ้าสวรรค์ พระเนตรของพระองค์มองและหนังตาของพระองค์ทดสอบบุตรทั้งหลายของมนุษย์
word.spanish1909: Jehová en el templo de su santidad: La silla de Jehová está en el cielo: Sus ojos ven, sus párpados examinan á los hijos de los hombres.
word.latinvulgate: Disperdat Dominus universa labia dolosa, et linguam magniloquam.
word.italian1927: L’Eterno è nel tempio della sua santità; l’Eterno ha il suo trono nei cieli; i suoi occhi veggono, le sue palpebre scrutano i figliuoli degli uomini.
word.german1912: Der HERR ist in seinem heiligen Tempel, des HERRN Stuhl ist im Himmel; seine Augen sehen darauf, seine Augenlider prüfen die Menschenkinder.
word.french1910: L'Eternel est dans son saint temple, L'Eternel a son trône dans les cieux; Ses yeux regardent, Ses paupières sondent les fils de l'homme.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華在他的聖殿裡，耶和華的寶座在天上，他的眼睛觀看，他的目光察驗世人。
word.korean: 여호와께서 그 성전에 계시니 여호와의 보좌는 하늘에 있음이여 그 눈이 인생을 통촉하시고 그 안목이 저희를 감찰하시도다
word.tagalog: Ang panginoon ay nasa kaniyang banal na templo, ang Panginoon, ang kaniyang luklukan ay nasa langit; ang kaniyang mga mata ay nagmamalas, ang kaniyang mga talukap-mata ay nagmamasid, sa mga anak ng mga tao.
word.maori: ¶ Kei tona temepara tapu a Ihowa, kei te rangi te torona o Ihowa: e titiro ana ona kanohi, e whakamatautau ana ona kamo i nga tama a te tangata.
word.cebuano: Si Jehova anaa sa iyang templo nga balaan; Si Jehova, ang iyang trono atua sa langit; Ang iyang mga mata nagatan-aw, ang iyang mga tabontabon nagasulay sa mga anak sa mga tawo.
word.hebrew: ד  יהוה בהיכל קדשו--    יהוה בשמים כסאו עיניו יחזו--    עפעפיו יבחנו בני אדם
word.hebrewmodern: יהוה בהיכל קדשו יהוה בשמים כסאו עיניו יחזו עפעפיו יבחנו בני אדם׃
word.greekot: ἐξολεθρεύσαι κύριος πάντα τὰ χείλη τὰ δόλια καὶ γλῶσσαν μεγαλορήμονα

word.kjv: The LORD looked down from heaven upon the children of men, to see if there were any that did understand, and seek God.
word.thailand: พระเยโฮวาห์ทรงมองลงมาจากฟ้าสวรรค์ ดูบุตรทั้งหลายของมนุษย์ว่าจะมีคนใดบ้างที่เข้าใจที่เสาะแสวงหาพระเจ้า
word.spanish1909: Jehová miró desde los cielos sobre los hijos de los hombres, Por ver si había algún entendido, Que buscara á Dios.
word.latinvulgate: Qui ingreditur sine macula, et operatur justitiam ;
word.italian1927: L’Eterno ha riguardato dal cielo sui figliuoli degli uomini per vedere se vi fosse alcuno che avesse intelletto, che cercasse Iddio.
word.german1912: Der HERR schaut vom Himmel auf der Menschen Kinder, daß er sehe, ob jemand klug sei und nach Gott frage.
word.french1910: L'Eternel, du haut des cieux, regarde les fils de l'homme, Pour voir s'il y a quelqu'un qui soit intelligent, Qui cherche Dieu.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華從天上察看世人，要看看有明慧的沒有，有尋求　神的沒有。
word.korean: 여호와께서 하늘에서 인생을 굽어 살피사 지각이 있어 하나님을 찾는 자가 있는가 보려 하신즉
word.tagalog: Tinutunghan ng Panginoon ang mga anak ng mga tao mula sa langit, upang tingnan, kung may sinomang nakakaunawa, na hinahanap ng Dios.
word.maori: I titiro iho a Ihowa i te rangi ki nga tama a te tangata, kia kite me kahore tetahi e mahara ana, e rapu ana i te Atua.
word.cebuano: Si Jehova nagsud-ong sukad sa langit sa ibabaw sa mga anak sa mga tawo, Sa pagtan-aw kong may usa ba nga nakasabut, Nga nangita sa Dios.
word.hebrew: ב  יהוה--    משמים השקיף על-בני-אדם לראות היש משכיל--    דרש את-אלהים
word.hebrewmodern: יהוה משמים השקיף על בני אדם לראות היש משכיל דרש את אלהים׃
word.greekot: πορευόμενος ἄμωμος καὶ ἐργαζόμενος δικαιοσύνην λαλῶν ἀλήθειαν ἐν καρδίᾳ αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: He bowed the heavens also, and came down: and darkness was under his feet.
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงโน้มฟ้าสวรรค์ลงด้วยและเสด็จลงมา ความมืดทึบอยู่ใต้พระบาทของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Y bajó los cielos, y descendió; Y oscuridad debajo de sus pies.
word.latinvulgate: Justitiæ Domini rectæ, lætificantes corda ; præceptum Domini lucidum, illuminans oculos.
word.italian1927: Egli abbassò i cieli e discese, avendo sotto i piedi una densa caligine.
word.german1912: Er neigte den Himmel und fuhr herab, und Dunkel war unter seinen Füßen.
word.french1910: Il abaissa les cieux, et il descendit: Il y avait une épaisse nuée sous ses pieds.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他使天下垂，親自降臨；在他的腳下黑雲密布。
word.korean: 저가 또 하늘을 드리우시고 강림하시니 그 발 아래는 어둑캄캄하도다
word.tagalog: Kaniya namang iniyuko ang mga langit, at ibinaba; at salimuot na kadiliman ay nasa ilalim ng kaniyang mga paa.
word.maori: I whakapingoretia e ia nga rangi, a heke iho ana, a i raro te pouri matotoru i ona waewae.
word.cebuano: Gibawog usab niya ang mga langit, ug mikunsad siya. Ug ang mabaga nga kangitngit diha sa ilalum sa iyang mga tiil.
word.hebrew: ט  עלה עשן באפו--    ואש-מפיו תאכל גחלים    בערו ממנו
word.hebrewmodern: ויט שמים וירד וערפל תחת רגליו׃
word.greekot: τὰ δικαιώματα κυρίου εὐθεῖα εὐφραίνοντα καρδίαν ἡ ἐντολὴ κυρίου τηλαυγής φωτίζουσα ὀφθαλμούς

word.kjv: The LORD also thundered in the heavens, and the Highest gave his voice; hail stones and coals of fire.
word.thailand: พระเยโฮวาห์ทรงคะนองกึกก้องในฟ้าสวรรค์ และองค์ผู้สูงสุดก็เปล่งพระสุรเสียง คือลูกเห็บและถ่านเพลิง
word.spanish1909: Y tronó en los cielos Jehová, Y el Altísimo dió su voz; Granizo y carbones de fuego.
word.latinvulgate: Delicta quis intelligit ? ab occultis meis munda me ;
word.italian1927: L’Eterno tuonò ne’ cieli e l’Altissimo diè fuori la sua voce con gragnuola e con carboni accesi.
word.german1912: Und der HERR donnerte im Himmel, und der Höchste ließ seinen Donner aus mit Hagel und Blitzen.
word.french1910: L'Eternel tonna dans les cieux, Le Très-Haut fit retentir sa voix, Avec la grêle et les charbons de feu.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華在天上打雷，至高者發出聲音，發出冰雹和火炭。
word.korean: 여호와께서 하늘에서 뇌성을 발하시고 지존하신 자가 음성을 내시며 우박과 숯불이 내리도다
word.tagalog: Ang Panginoon naman ay kumulog sa mga langit, at pinatunog ng Kataastaasan ang kaniyang tinig; mga granizo, at mga bagang apoy.
word.maori: I papa ano te whatitiri a Ihowa i nga rangi, a puaki ana te reo o te Runga Rawa; he whatu, he waro kapura.
word.cebuano: Si Jehova usab midalugdog didto sa kalangitan, Ug ang Hataas Uyamut misinggit sa iyang tingog, Ulan-nga-yelo ug mga baga sa kalayo.
word.hebrew: יג  מנגה נגדו    עביו עברו--ברד וגחלי-אש
word.hebrewmodern: וירעם בשמים יהוה ועליון יתן קלו ברד וגחלי אש׃
word.greekot: παραπτώματα τίς συνήσει ἐκ τῶν κρυφίων μου καθάρισόν με

word.kjv: The heavens declare the glory of God; and the firmament sheweth his handywork.
word.thailand: ฟ้าสวรรค์ประกาศสง่าราศีของพระเจ้า และภาคพื้นฟ้าสำแดงพระหัตถกิจของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Al Músico principal: Salmo de David. LOS cielos cuentan la gloria de Dios, Y la expansión denuncia la obra de sus manos.
word.latinvulgate: In finem. Psalmus David.
word.italian1927: Al Capo dei musici. Salmo di Davide. I cieli raccontano la gloria di Dio e il firmamento annunzia l’opera delle sue mani.
word.german1912: Ein Psalm Davids, vorzusingen.  Die Himmel erzählen die Ehre Gottes, und die Feste verkündigt seiner Hände Werk.
word.french1910: Au chef des chantres. Psaume de David. Les cieux racontent la gloire de Dieu, Et l'étendue manifeste l'oeuvre de ses mains.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 大衛的詩，交給詩班長。諸天述說　神的榮耀，穹蒼傳揚他的作為。
word.korean: (다윗의 시. 영장으로 한 노래) 하늘이 하나님의 영광을 선포하고 궁창이 그 손으로 하신 일을 나타내는도다
word.tagalog: Ang kalangitan ay nagpapahayag ng kaluwalhatian ng Dios; at ipinakikilala ng kalawakan ang gawa ng kaniyang kamay.
word.maori: ¶ Ki te tino kaiwhakatangi. He himene na Rawiri. E korerotia ana e nga rangi te kororia o te Atua; a e whakaaturia ana e te kikorangi te mahi a ona ringa.
word.cebuano: Ang mga langit nagapahayag sa himaya sa Dios; Ug ang hawan nagapadayag sa buhat sa iyang mga kamot.
word.hebrew: א  למנצח מזמור לדוד
word.hebrewmodern: למנצח מזמור לדוד השמים מספרים כבוד אל ומעשה ידיו מגיד הרקיע׃
word.greekot: εἰς τὸ τέλος ψαλμὸς τῷ δαυιδ

word.kjv: His going forth is from the end of the heaven, and his circuit unto the ends of it: and there is nothing hid from the heat thereof.
word.thailand: ดวงอาทิตย์ขึ้นมาจากสุดปลายฟ้าสวรรค์ข้างหนึ่ง และโคจรไปถึงที่สุดปลายอีกข้างหนึ่ง ไม่มีสิ่งใดสามารถซ่อนให้พ้นจากความร้อนของมันได้
word.spanish1909: Del un cabo de los cielos es su salida, Y su giro hasta la extremidad de ellos: Y no hay quien se esconda de su calor.
word.latinvulgate: Lætabimur in salutari tuo ; et in nomine Dei nostri magnificabimur.
word.italian1927: La sua uscita e da una estremità de’ cieli, e il suo giro arriva fino all’altra estremità; e niente è nascosto al suo calore.
word.german1912: Sie geht auf an einem Ende des Himmels und läuft um bis wieder an sein Ende, und bleibt nichts vor ihrer Hitze verborgen.
word.french1910: Il se lève à une extrémité des cieux, Et achève sa course à l'autre extrémité: Rien ne se dérobe à sa chaleur.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 它從天的這邊出來，繞行到天的那邊；沒有甚麼可以隱藏，得不到它的溫暖。
word.korean: 하늘 이 끝에서 나와서 하늘 저 끝까지 운행함이여 그 온기에서 피하여 숨은 자 없도다
word.tagalog: Ang kaniyang labasan ay mula sa wakas ng mga langit, at ang kaniyang ligid ay sa mga wakas niyaon: at walang bagay na nakukubli sa pagiinit niyaon.
word.maori: Ko tona putanga kei tetahi pito o te rangi, a whawhe noa ke tetahi pito: kahore hoki tetahi mea e ngaro i tona mahana.
word.cebuano: Gikan sa usa ka kinatumyan sa mga langit mao ang iyang paggikan, Ug ang iyang paglibut ngadto sa mga kinatumyan niini; Ug walay bisan unsa nga natago gikan sa iyang kainit.
word.hebrew: ו  והוא--כחתן יצא מחפתו    ישיש כגבור לרוץ ארח
word.hebrewmodern: מקצה השמים מוצאו ותקופתו על קצותם ואין נסתר מחמתו׃
word.greekot: ἀγαλλιασόμεθα ἐν τῷ σωτηρίῳ σου καὶ ἐν ὀνόματι θεοῦ ἡμῶν μεγαλυνθησόμεθα πληρώσαι κύριος πάντα τὰ αἰτήματά σου

word.kjv: Now know I that the LORD saveth his anointed; he will hear him from his holy heaven with the saving strength of his right hand.
word.thailand: บัดนี้ ข้าพเจ้าทราบว่าพระเยโฮวาห์จะทรงช่วยผู้ที่พระองค์ทรงเจิมไว้ พระองค์จะทรงฟังเขาจากฟ้าสวรรค์อันบริสุทธิ์ของพระองค์ และโดยชัยชนะอันทรงอานุภาพด้วยพระหัตถ์ขวาของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Ahora echo de ver que Jehová guarda á su ungido: Oirálo desde los cielos de su santidad, Con la fuerza de la salvación de su diestra.
word.latinvulgate: Magna est gloria ejus in salutari tuo ; gloriam et magnum decorem impones super eum.
word.italian1927: Già io so che l’Eterno ha salvato il suo Unto, e gli risponderà dal cielo della sua santità, con le potenti liberazioni della sua destra.
word.german1912: Nun merke ich, daß der HERR seinem Gesalbten hilft und erhöht ihn in seinen heiligen Himmel; seine rechte Hand hilft mit Macht.
word.french1910: Je sais déjà que l'Eternel sauve son oint; Il l'exaucera des cieux, de sa sainte demeure, Par le secours puissant de sa droite.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 現在我確知，耶和華拯救自己的受膏者；他必從他的聖天上應允他，用自己右手的能力拯救他。
word.korean: 여호와께서 자기에게 속한 바 기름부음 받은 자를 구원하시는 줄 이제 내가 아노니 그 오른손에 구원하는 힘으로 그 거룩한 하늘에서 저에게 응락하시리로다
word.tagalog: Talastas ko ngayon na inililigtas ng Panginoon ang kaniyang pinahiran ng langis; sasagutin niya siya mula sa kaniyang banal na langit ng pangligtas na kalakasan ng kaniyang kanang kamay.
word.maori: ¶ Katahi ahau ka matau e whakaora ana a Ihowa i tana tangata i whakawahi ai, ka whakahoki kupu ia ki a ia i tona rangi tapu, me te kaha ano tona ringa matau ki te whakaora.
word.cebuano: Karon nahibalo ako nga si Jehova nagaluwas sa iyang dinihog; Siya magatubag kaniya gikan sa iyang langit nga balaan Uban sa kusog sa kaluwasan sa iyang toong kamot.
word.hebrew: ו  נרננה בישועתך--    ובשם-אלהינו נדגל ימלא יהוה    כל-משאלותיך
word.hebrewmodern: עתה ידעתי כי הושיע יהוה משיחו יענהו משמי קדשו בגברות ישע ימינו׃
word.greekot: μεγάλη ἡ δόξα αὐτοῦ ἐν τῷ σωτηρίῳ σου δόξαν καὶ μεγαλοπρέπειαν ἐπιθήσεις ἐπ' αὐτόν

word.kjv: By the word of the LORD were the heavens made; and all the host of them by the breath of his mouth.
word.thailand: โดยพระวจนะของพระเยโฮวาห์ฟ้าสวรรค์ก็ถูกสร้างขึ้นมา กับบริวารทั้งปวงก็ด้วยลมพระโอษฐ์ของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Por la palabra de Jehová fueron hechos los cielos, Y todo el ejército de ellos por el espíritu de su boca.
word.latinvulgate: Accedite ad eum, et illuminamini ; et facies vestræ non confundentur.
word.italian1927: I cieli furon fatti dalla parola dell’Eterno, e tutto il loro esercito dal soffio della sua bocca.
word.german1912: Der Himmel ist durch das Wort des HERRN gemacht und all sein Heer durch den Geist seines Mundes.
word.french1910: Les cieux ont été faits par la parole de l'Eternel, Et toute leur armée par le souffle de sa bouche.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 諸天藉著耶和華的話而造，天上的萬象藉著他口中的氣而成。
word.korean: 여호와의 말씀으로 하늘이 지음이 되었으며 그 만상이 그 입기운으로 이루었도다
word.tagalog: Sa pamamagitan ng salita ng Panginoon ay nayari ang mga langit; at lahat ng natatanaw roon ay sa pamamagitan ng hinga ng kaniyang bibig.
word.maori: Na te kupu a Ihowa nga rangi i hanga; ko nga mano katoa hoki o reira na te ha o tona mangai.
word.cebuano: Pinaagi sa pulong ni Jehova nabuhat ang mga langit, Ug ang tanan nga panon nila pinaagi sa gininhawa sa iyang baba.
word.hebrew: ו  בדבר יהוה שמים נעשו    וברוח פיו כל-צבאם
word.hebrewmodern: בדבר יהוה שמים נעשו וברוח פיו כל צבאם׃
word.greekot: προσέλθατε πρὸς αὐτὸν καὶ φωτίσθητε καὶ τὰ πρόσωπα ὑμῶν οὐ μὴ καταισχυνθῇ

word.kjv: The LORD looketh from heaven; he beholdeth all the sons of men.
word.thailand: พระเยโฮวาห์ทอดพระเนตรจากฟ้าสวรรค์ พระองค์ทอดพระเนตรบุตรทั้งหลายของมนุษย์
word.spanish1909: Desde los cielos miró Jehová; Vió á todos los hijos de los hombres:
word.latinvulgate: Quis est homo qui vult vitam, diligit dies videre bonos ?
word.italian1927: L’Eterno guarda dal cielo; egli vede tutti i figliuoli degli uomini:
word.german1912: Der HERR schaut vom Himmel und sieht aller Menschen Kinder.
word.french1910: L'Eternel regarde du haut des cieux, Il voit tous les fils de l'homme;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華從天上觀看，他看見全人類。
word.korean: 여호와께서 하늘에서 감찰하사 모든 인생을 보심이여
word.tagalog: Ang Panginoon ay tumitingin mula sa langit; kaniyang minamasdan ang lahat na anak ng mga tao;
word.maori: E titiro iho ana a Ihowa i te rangi: e kite ana ia i nga tama katoa a te tangata.
word.cebuano: Gikan sa langit nagsud-ong si Jehova; Nakita niya ang tanang mga anak sa mga tawo;
word.hebrew: יג  משמים הביט יהוה    ראה את-כל-בני האדם
word.hebrewmodern: משמים הביט יהוה ראה את כל בני האדם׃
word.greekot: τίς ἐστιν ἄνθρωπος ὁ θέλων ζωὴν ἀγαπῶν ἡμέρας ἰδεῖν ἀγαθάς

word.kjv: Thy mercy, O LORD, is in the heavens; and thy faithfulness reacheth unto the clouds.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ ความเมตตาของพระองค์อยู่ในฟ้าสวรรค์ ความสัตย์ซื่อของพระองค์ไปถึงเมฆ
word.spanish1909: Jehová, hasta los cielos es tu misericordia; Tu verdad hasta las nubes.
word.latinvulgate: Revela Domino viam tuam, et spera in eo, et ipse faciet.
word.italian1927: O Eterno, la tua benignità va fino al cielo, e la tua fedeltà fino alle nuvole.
word.german1912: HERR, deine Güte reicht, soweit der Himmel ist, und deine Wahrheit, soweit die Wolken gehen.
word.french1910: Eternel! ta bonté atteint jusqu'aux cieux, Ta fidélité jusqu'aux nues.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華啊！你的慈愛上及諸天，你的信實高達雲霄。
word.korean: 주의 의는 하나님의 산들과 같고 주의 판단은 큰 바다와 일반이라 여호와여, 주는 사람과 짐승을 보호하시나이다
word.tagalog: Ang iyong kagandahang-loob, Oh Panginoon, ay nasa mga langit: ang iyong pagtatapat ay umaabot hanggang sa langit.
word.maori: ¶ Kei nga rangi, e Ihowa, tau mahi tohu: tutuki noa atu tou pono ki nga kapua.
word.cebuano: Oh Jehova, ang imong mahigugmaong-kalolot anaa sa mga langit; Ang imong pagkamatinumanon nagaabut ngadto sa mga langit.
word.hebrew: ה  און יחשב--על-משכבו    יתיצב על-דרך לא-טוב רע לא ימאס
word.hebrewmodern: יהוה בהשמים חסדך אמונתך עד שחקים׃
word.greekot: ἀποκάλυψον πρὸς κύριον τὴν ὁδόν σου καὶ ἔλπισον ἐπ' αὐτόν καὶ αὐτὸς ποιήσει

word.kjv: He shall call to the heavens from above, and to the earth, that he may judge his people.
word.thailand: พระองค์จะทรงเรียกถึงฟ้าสวรรค์เบื้องบน และถึงแผ่นดินโลก เพื่อพระองค์จะทรงพิพากษาประชาชนของพระองค์ว่า
word.spanish1909: Convocará á los cielos de arriba, Y á la tierra, para juzgar á su pueblo.
word.latinvulgate: Amplius lava me ab iniquitate mea, et a peccato meo munda me.
word.italian1927: Egli chiama i cieli di sopra e la terra per assistere al giudicio del suo popolo:
word.german1912: Er ruft Himmel und Erde, daß er sein Volk richte:
word.french1910: Il crie vers les cieux en haut, Et vers la terre, pour juger son peuple:
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他向天上、向地下呼喚，為要審判自己的子民，說：
word.korean: 하나님이 그 백성을 판단하시려고 윗 하늘과 아래 땅에 반포하여
word.tagalog: Siya'y tatawag sa langit sa itaas, at sa lupa upang mahatulan niya ang kaniyang bayan:
word.maori: Ka karangatia e ia nga rangi i runga, me te whenua hoki, ki te whakaritenga mo tona iwi.
word.cebuano: Nagatawag siya sa mga langit sa kahitas-an, Ug sa yuta, aron pagahukman niya ang iyang katawohan:
word.hebrew: ד  יקרא אל-השמים מעל    ואל-הארץ לדין עמו
word.hebrewmodern: יקרא אל השמים מעל ואל הארץ לדין עמו׃
word.greekot: ἐπὶ πλεῖον πλῦνόν με ἀπὸ τῆς ἀνομίας μου καὶ ἀπὸ τῆς ἁμαρτίας μου καθάρισόν με

word.kjv: And the heavens shall declare his righteousness: for God is judge himself. Selah.
word.thailand: ฟ้าสวรรค์จะประกาศความชอบธรรมของพระองค์ เพราะพระเจ้านั่นแหละทรงเป็นผู้พิพากษา เซลาห์
word.spanish1909: Y denunciarán los cielos su justicia; Porque Dios es el juez. (Selah.)
word.latinvulgate: Tibi soli peccavi, et malum coram te feci ; ut justificeris in sermonibus tuis, et vincas cum judicaris.
word.italian1927: E i cieli proclameranno la sua giustizia; perché Dio stesso sta per giudicare. Sela.
word.german1912: Und die Himmel werden seine Gerechtigkeit verkündigen; denn Gott ist Richter. (Sela.)
word.french1910: Et les cieux publieront sa justice, Car c'est Dieu qui est juge. -Pause.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 諸天宣揚他的公義，因為　神自己就是審判者。（細拉）
word.korean: 하늘이 그 공의를 선포하리니 하나님 그는 심판장이심이로다 (셀라)
word.tagalog: At ipahahayag ng langit ang kaniyang katuwiran; sapagka't ang Dios ay siyang hukom. (Selah)
word.maori: A ma nga rangi e whakakite tona tika: ko te Atua ake nei hoki te kaiwhakawa. (Hera.
word.cebuano: Ug ang mga langit magapadayag sa iyang pagkamatarung; Kay ang Dios maoy maghuhukom sa iyang kaugalingon. (Selah)
word.hebrew: ו  ויגידו שמים צדקו    כי-אלהים שפט הוא סלה
word.hebrewmodern: ויגידו שמים צדקו כי אלהים שפט הוא סלה׃
word.greekot: σοὶ μόνῳ ἥμαρτον καὶ τὸ πονηρὸν ἐνώπιόν σου ἐποίησα ὅπως ἂν δικαιωθῇς ἐν τοῖς λόγοις σου καὶ νικήσῃς ἐν τῷ κρίνεσθαί σε

word.kjv: God looked down from heaven upon the children of men, to see if there were any that did understand, that did seek God.
word.thailand: พระเจ้าทรงมองลงมาจากฟ้าสวรรค์ ดูบุตรทั้งหลายของมนุษย์ว่าจะมีคนใดบ้างที่เข้าใจที่เสาะแสวงหาพระเจ้า
word.spanish1909: Dios desde los cielos miró sobre los hijos de los hombres, Por ver si hay algún entendido Que busque á Dios.
word.latinvulgate: cum venissent Ziphæi, et dixissent ad Saul : Nonne David absconditus est apud nos ?
word.italian1927: Iddio ha riguardato dal cielo sui figliuoli degli uomini per vedere se vi fosse alcuno che avesse intelletto, che cercasse Iddio.
word.german1912: Gott schaut vom Himmel auf der Menschen Kinder, daß er sehe, ob jemand klug sei, der nach Gott frage.
word.french1910: Dieu, du haut des cieux, regarde les fils de l'homme, Pour voir s'il y a quelqu'un qui soit intelligent, Qui cherche Dieu.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神從天上察看世人，要看看有明慧的沒有，有尋求　神的沒有，
word.korean: 하나님이 하늘에서 인생을 굽어 살피사 지각이 있는 자와 하나님을 찾는 자가 있는가 보려 하신즉
word.tagalog: Tinunghan ng Dios ang mga anak ng mga tao mula sa langit, upang tignan kung may sinomang nakakaunawa, na humanap sa Dios.
word.maori: I titiro iho te Atua i te rangi ki nga tama a te tangata, kia kite me kahore tetahi e mahara ana, e rapu ana i te Atua.
word.cebuano: Ang Dios nagsud-ong gikan sa langit sa ibabaw sa mga anak sa mga tawo, Sa pagtan-aw kong aduna bay bisan kinsa nga nakasabut, Nga nangita sa Dios.
word.hebrew: ב  אמר נבל בלבו    אין אלהים השחיתו והתעיבו עול--    אין עשה-טוב
word.hebrewmodern: אלהים משמים השקיף על בני אדם לראות היש משכיל דרש את אלהים׃
word.greekot: ἐν τῷ ἐλθεῖν τοὺς ζιφαίους καὶ εἰπεῖν τῷ σαουλ οὐκ ἰδοὺ δαυιδ κέκρυπται παρ' ἡμῖν

word.kjv: He shall send from heaven, and save from the reproach of him that would swallow me up. Selah. God shall send forth his mercy and his truth.
word.thailand: พระองค์จะทรงใช้มาจากฟ้าสวรรค์ และช่วยข้าพเจ้าให้รอดจากการเยาะเย้ยของผู้ที่อยากกลืนข้าพเจ้าเสีย เซลาห์ พระเจ้าจะทรงใช้ความเมตตาและความจริงลงมา
word.spanish1909: El enviará desde los cielos, y me salvará De la infamia del que me apura; (Selah) Dios enviará su misericordia y su verdad.
word.latinvulgate: Etenim in corde iniquitates operamini ; in terra injustitias manus vestræ concinnant.
word.italian1927: Egli manderà dal cielo a salvarmi. Mentre colui che anela a divorarmi m’oltraggia, Sela. Iddio manderà la sua grazia e la sua fedeltà.
word.german1912: Er sendet vom Himmel und hilft mir von der Schmähung des, der wider mich schnaubt. (Sela.) Gott sendet seine Güte und Treue.
word.french1910: Il m'enverra du ciel le salut, Tandis que mon persécuteur se répand en outrages; -Pause. Dieu enverra sa bonté et sa fidélité.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神從天上施恩拯救我，斥責那踐踏我的人；（細拉）　神必向我發出他的慈愛和信實。
word.korean: 저가 하늘에서 보내사 나를 삼키려는 자의 비방에서 나를 구원하실지라 (셀라) 하나님이 그 인자와 진리를 보내시리로다
word.tagalog: Siya'y magsusugo mula sa langit, at ililigtas ako, pagka yaong lulunok sa akin ay dumuduwahagi; (Selah) susuguin ng Dios ang kaniyang kagandahang-loob at ang kaniyang katotohanan.
word.maori: Ka unga mai e ia he kaiwhakaora moku i te rangi, ina tawai te tangata e mea ana kia horomia ahau; (Hera.) ka unga mai e te Atua tana mahi tohu me tona pono.
word.cebuano: Siya magapadala gikan sa langit, ug magaluwas kanako, Sa diha nga ang buot motukob kanako magabiay-biay; (Selah Ang Dios magapadala sa iyang mahigugmaong-kalolot ug sa iyang kamatuoran.
word.hebrew: ג  אקרא לאלהים עליון    לאל גמר עלי
word.hebrewmodern: ישלח משמים ויושיעני חרף שאפי סלה ישלח אלהים חסדו ואמתו׃
word.greekot: καὶ γὰρ ἐν καρδίᾳ ἀνομίας ἐργάζεσθε ἐν τῇ γῇ ἀδικίαν αἱ χεῖρες ὑμῶν συμπλέκουσιν

word.kjv: Be thou exalted, O God, above the heavens; let thy glory be above all the earth.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเจ้า ขอทรงเป็นที่ยกย่องเหนือฟ้าสวรรค์ ขอสง่าราศีของพระองค์อยู่เหนือทั่วแผ่นดินโลก
word.spanish1909: Ensálzate sobre los cielos, oh Dios; Sobre toda la tierra tu gloria.
word.latinvulgate: Furor illis secundum similitudinem serpentis, sicut aspidis surdæ et obturantis aures suas,
word.italian1927: Innalzati, o Dio, al disopra de’ cieli, risplenda su tutta la terra la tua gloria!
word.german1912: Erhebe dich, Gott, über den Himmel, und deine Ehre über alle Welt.
word.french1910: Elève-toi sur les cieux, ô Dieu! Que ta gloire soit sur toute la terre!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神啊！願你被尊崇，過於諸天；願你的榮耀遍及全地。
word.korean: 하나님이여, 주는 하늘 위에 높이 들리시며 주의 영광은 온 세계 위에 높아지기를 원하나이다
word.tagalog: Mabunyi ka, Oh Dios, sa itaas ng mga langit; mataas ang iyong kaluwalhatian sa buong lupa.
word.maori: Kia whakanuia koe, e te Atua, ki runga ake i nga rangi: hei runga atu i te whenua katoa tou kororia.
word.cebuano: Igatuboy ka, Oh Dios, ibabaw sa mga langit; Sa ibabaw sa tibook nga yuta ibutang ang imong himaya.
word.hebrew: ה  נפשי בתוך לבאם--    אשכבה להטים בני-אדם--שניהם חנית וחצים    ולשונם חרב חדה
word.hebrewmodern: רומה על השמים אלהים על כל הארץ כבודך׃
word.greekot: θυμὸς αὐτοῖς κατὰ τὴν ὁμοίωσιν τοῦ ὄφεως ὡσεὶ ἀσπίδος κωφῆς καὶ βυούσης τὰ ὦτα αὐτῆς

word.kjv: For thy mercy is great unto the heavens, and thy truth unto the clouds.
word.thailand: เพราะความเมตตาของพระองค์ใหญ่ยิ่งถึงฟ้าสวรรค์ ความจริงของพระองค์สูงถึงเมฆ
word.spanish1909: Porque grande es hasta los cielos tu misericordia, Y hasta las nubes tu verdad.
word.latinvulgate: Priusquam intelligerent spinæ vestræ rhamnum, sicut viventes sic in ira absorbet eos.
word.italian1927: perché grande fino al cielo e la tua benignità, e la tua fedeltà fino alle nuvole.
word.german1912: Denn deine Güte ist, soweit der Himmel ist, und deine Wahrheit, soweit die Wolken gehen.
word.french1910: Car ta bonté atteint jusqu'aux cieux, Et ta fidélité jusqu'aux nues.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為你的慈愛偉大，高及諸天，你的信實上達雲霄。
word.korean: 대저 주의 인자는 커서 하늘에 미치고 주의 진리는 궁창에 이르나이다
word.tagalog: Sapagka't ang iyong kagandahang-loob ay dakila hanggang sa mga langit, at ang iyong katotohanan hanggang sa mga alapaap.
word.maori: He nui hoki tau mahi tohu, a tutuki noa ki nga rangi, me tou pono a tutuki noa ki nga kapua.
word.cebuano: Kay ang imong mahigugmaong-kalolot daku ngadto sa mga langit, Ug ang imong kamatuoran hangtud sa mga langit.
word.hebrew: י  אודך בעמים אדני    אזמרך בלאמים
word.hebrewmodern: כי גדל עד שמים חסדך ועד שחקים אמתך׃
word.greekot: πρὸ τοῦ συνιέναι τὰς ἀκάνθας ὑμῶν τὴν ῥάμνον ὡσεὶ ζῶντας ὡσεὶ ἐν ὀργῇ καταπίεται ὑμᾶς

word.kjv: Be thou exalted, O God, above the heavens: let thy glory be above all the earth.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเจ้า ขอทรงเป็นที่เชิดชูเหนือฟ้าสวรรค์ ขอสง่าราศีของพระองค์อยู่เหนือทั่วแผ่นดินโลก
word.spanish1909: Ensálzate sobre los cielos, oh Dios; Sobre toda la tierra tu gloria.
word.latinvulgate: Lætabitur justus cum viderit vindictam ; manus suas lavabit in sanguine peccatoris.
word.italian1927: Innalzati, o Dio, al di sopra de’ cieli, risplenda su tutta la terra la tua gloria!
word.german1912: Erhebe dich, Gott, über den Himmel, und deine Ehre über alle Welt.
word.french1910: Elève-toi sur les cieux, ô Dieu! Que ta gloire soit sur toute la terre!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神啊！願你被尊崇，過於諸天；願你的榮耀遍及全地。
word.korean: 하나님이여, 주는 하늘 위에 높이 들리시며 주의 영광은 온 세계위에 높아지기를 원하나이다
word.tagalog: Mabunyi ka, Oh Dios, sa itaas ng mga langit; mataas ang iyong kaluwalhatian sa buong lupa.
word.maori: Kia whakanuia koe, e te Atua, ki runga i nga rangi: hei runga i te whenua katoa tou kororia.
word.cebuano: Igatuboy ka, Oh Dios, sa ibabaw sa mga langit; Sa ibabaw sa tibook nga yuta ibutang ang imong himaya.
word.hebrew: יא  כי-גדל עד-שמים חסדך    ועד-שחקים אמתך [ (Psalms 57:12) יב  רומה על-שמים אלהים    על כל-הארץ כבודך ]
word.hebrewmodern: רומה על שמים אלהים על כל הארץ כבודך׃
word.greekot: εὐφρανθήσεται δίκαιος ὅταν ἴδῃ ἐκδίκησιν ἀσεβῶν τὰς χεῖρας αὐτοῦ νίψεται ἐν τῷ αἵματι τοῦ ἁμαρτωλοῦ

word.kjv: Sing unto God, sing praises to his name: extol him that rideth upon the heavens by his name JAH, and rejoice before him.
word.thailand: จงร้องเพลงถวายพระเจ้า จงร้องเพลงสรรเสริญพระนามของพระองค์ จงยกย่องพระองค์ผู้ทรงเมฆเป็นพาหนะโดยพระนามของพระองค์คือพระเยโฮวาห์ จงลิงโลดต่อเบื้องพระพักตร์พระองค์
word.spanish1909: Cantad á Dios, cantad salmos á su nombre: Ensalzad al que sube sobre los cielos En JAH su nombre, y alegraos delante de él.
word.latinvulgate: Laboravi clamans, raucæ factæ sunt fauces meæ ; defecerunt oculi mei, dum spero in Deum meum.
word.italian1927: Cantate a Dio, salmeggiate al suo nome, preparate la via a colui che cavalca attraverso i deserti; il suo nome è: l’Eterno, ed esultate dinanzi a lui.
word.german1912: Singet Gott, lobsinget seinem Namen! Machet Bahn dem, der durch die Wüste herfährt-er heißt HERR -,und freuet euch vor ihm,
word.french1910: Chantez à Dieu, célébrez son nom! Frayez le chemin à celui qui s'avance à travers les plaines! L'Eternel est son nom: réjouissez-vous devant lui!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你們要向　神歌唱，歌頌他的名；為那乘車經過曠野的預備道路（本句或譯：“高舉那乘駕雲彩之上的”）；他的名是耶和華，你們要在他面前歡樂。
word.korean: 하나님께 노래하며 그 이름을 찬양하라 타고 광야에 행하시던 자를 위하여 대로를 수축하라 그 이름은 여호와시니 그 앞에서 뛰놀지어다
word.tagalog: Kayo'y magsiawit sa Dios, kayo'y magsiawit ng kapurihan sa kaniyang pangalan: ipaghanda ninyo ng maluwang na lansangan siya na nangangabayo sa mga ilang; ang kaniyang pangalan ay JAH; at mangagalak kayo sa harap niya.
word.maori: Waiata ki te Atua, himenetia tona ingoa; opehia ake he huanui mo tana hariata i nga koraha; tona ingoa ko IHA; kia hari hoki ki tona aroaro.
word.cebuano: Manag-awit kamo sa Dios, manag-awit kamo ug mga pagdayeg sa iyang ngalan: Pagbutang ug usa ka dalan alang kaniya nga molabay ngadto sa mga kamingawan; Si Jehova mao ang iyang ngalan; ug managhimaya kamo sa atubangan niya.
word.hebrew: ד  וצדיקים--ישמחו יעלצו לפני אלהים    וישישו בשמחה
word.hebrewmodern: שירו לאלהים זמרו שמו סלו לרכב בערבות ביה שמו ועלזו לפניו׃
word.greekot: ἐκοπίασα κράζων ἐβραγχίασεν ὁ λάρυγξ μου ἐξέλιπον οἱ ὀφθαλμοί μου ἀπὸ τοῦ ἐλπίζειν ἐπὶ τὸν θεόν μου

word.kjv: The earth shook, the heavens also dropped at the presence of God: even Sinai itself was moved at the presence of God, the God of Israel.
word.thailand: แผ่นดินโลกก็หวั่นไหว ท้องฟ้าก็เทฝนลงมาต่อเบื้องพระพักตร์พระเจ้า ภูเขาซีนายโน้มสั่นสะเทือนต่อเบื้องพระพักตร์พระเจ้าคือพระเจ้าของอิสราเอล
word.spanish1909: La tierra tembló; También destilaron los cielos á la presencia de Dios: Aquel Sinaí tembló delante de Dios, del Dios de Israel.
word.latinvulgate: Quoniam propter te sustinui opprobrium ; operuit confusio faciem meam.
word.italian1927: la terra tremò; anche i cieli si strussero in pioggia per la presenza di Dio; lo stesso Sinai tremò alla presenza di Dio, dell’Iddio d’Israele.
word.german1912: da bebte die Erde, und die Himmel troffen vor Gott, dieser Sinai vor dem Gott, der Israels Gott ist.
word.french1910: La terre trembla, les cieux se fondirent devant Dieu, Le Sinaï s'ébranla devant Dieu, le Dieu d'Israël.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 地就震動，在你面前天也落下雨來；這西奈山在　神面前，就是在以色列的　神面前，也要震動。
word.korean: 땅이 진동하며 하늘이 하나님 앞에서 떨어지며 저 시내산도 하나님 곧 이스라엘의 하나님 앞에서 진동하였나이다
word.tagalog: Ang lupa ay nayanig, ang mga langit naman ay tumulo sa harapan ng Dios: ang Sinai na yaon ay nayanig sa harapan ng Dios, ng Dios ng Israel.
word.maori: I wiri te whenua, i tuturu iho ano nga rangi i te aroaro o te Atua; me taua Hinai ano i te aroaro o te Atua, o te Atua o Iharaira.
word.cebuano: Ang yuta mikurog, Ang mga langit mipaulan usab diha sa presencia sa Dios: Kadtong Sinai mikurog diha sa presencia sa Dios, ang Dios sa Israel.
word.hebrew: ח  אלהים--בצאתך לפני עמך    בצעדך בישימון סלה
word.hebrewmodern: ארץ רעשה אף שמים נטפו מפני אלהים זה סיני מפני אלהים אלהי ישראל׃
word.greekot: ὅτι ἕνεκα σοῦ ὑπήνεγκα ὀνειδισμόν ἐκάλυψεν ἐντροπὴ τὸ πρόσωπόν μου

word.kjv: To him that rideth upon the heavens of heavens, which were of old; lo, he doth send out his voice, and that a mighty voice.
word.thailand: ต่อพระองค์ผู้ทรงฟ้าสวรรค์ ฟ้าสวรรค์ดึกดำบรรพ์ ดูเถิด พระองค์ทรงเปล่งพระสุรเสียงของพระองค์ คือพระสุรเสียงทรงมหิทธิฤทธิ์
word.spanish1909: Al que cabalga sobre los cielos de los cielos que son de antiguo: He aquí á su voz dará voz de fortaleza.
word.latinvulgate: Videant pauperes, et lætentur ; quærite Deum, et vivet anima vestra,
word.italian1927: a colui che cavalca sui cieli dei cieli eterni! Ecco, egli fa risonar la sua voce, la sua voce potente.
word.german1912: dem, der da fährt im Himmel allenthalben von Anbeginn! Siehe, er wird seinem Donner Kraft geben.
word.french1910: Chantez à celui qui s'avance dans les cieux, les cieux éternels! Voici, il fait entendre sa voix, sa voix puissante.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 歌頌那乘駕在自古就有的眾天之上的主；看哪！他發出了強而有力的聲音。
word.korean: 옛적 하늘들의 하늘을 타신 자에게 찬송하라 ! 주께서 그 소리를 발하시니 웅장한 소리로다
word.tagalog: Sa kaniya na sumasakay sa langit ng mga langit, na noon pang una: narito, binibigkas niya ang kaniyang tinig, na makapangyarihang tinig,
word.maori: Ki a ia, ko tona hariata nei ko nga rangi o nga rangi, nonamata: na, ka puaki tona reo, he reo kaha.
word.cebuano: Alang kaniya nga nagasakay sa ibabaw sa mga langit sa kalangitan, nga gikan pa sa karaang panahon; Ania karon, nagahatag siya sa iyang tingog, usa ka gamhanang tingog.
word.hebrew: לג  ממלכות הארץ שירו לאלהים    זמרו אדני סלה
word.hebrewmodern: לרכב בשמי שמי קדם הן יתן בקולו קול עז׃
word.greekot: ἰδέτωσαν πτωχοὶ καὶ εὐφρανθήτωσαν ἐκζητήσατε τὸν θεόν καὶ ζήσεται ἡ ψυχὴ ὑμῶν

word.kjv: Let the heaven and earth praise him, the seas, and everything that moveth therein.
word.thailand: ขอฟ้าสวรรค์และแผ่นดินโลกสรรเสริญพระองค์ ทั้งทะเลและสรรพสิ่งที่เคลื่อนไหวอยู่ในนั้น
word.spanish1909: Alábenlo los cielos y la tierra, Los mares, y todo lo que se mueve en ellos.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Lo lodino i cieli e la terra, i mari e tutto ciò che si muove in essi!
word.german1912: Es lobe ihn Himmel, Erde und Meer und alles, was sich darin regt.
word.french1910: Que les cieux et la terre le célèbrent, Les mers et tout ce qui s'y meut!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 願天和地都讚美他，願海洋和海中一切生物都讚美他。
word.korean: 천지가 그를 찬송할 것이요 바다와 그 중의 모든 동물도 그리할지로다
word.tagalog: Purihin siya ng langit at lupa, ng mga dagat, at ng bawa't bagay na gumagalaw roon.
word.maori: Kia whakamoemiti te rangi me te whenua ki a ia, nga moana, me nga mea katoa e tere ana i roto.
word.cebuano: Padayega kaniya ang langit ug ang yuta, Ang kadagatan, ug ang tanang mga nagalihok diha kanila.
word.hebrew: לד  כי-שמע אל-אביונים יהוה    ואת-אסיריו לא בזה
word.hebrewmodern: יהללוהו שמים וארץ ימים וכל רמש בם׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: They set their mouth against the heavens, and their tongue walketh through the earth.
word.thailand: เขาอ้าปากสู้ฟ้าสวรรค์ และลิ้นของเขาก็คะนองไปในโลก
word.spanish1909: Ponen en el cielo su boca, Y su lengua pasea la tierra.
word.latinvulgate: Signa nostra non vidimus ; jam non est propheta ; et nos non cognoscet amplius.
word.italian1927: Metton la loro bocca nel cielo, e la loro lingua passeggia per la terra.
word.german1912: Was sie reden, daß muß vom Himmel herab geredet sein; was sie sagen, das muß gelten auf Erden.
word.french1910: Ils élèvent leur bouche jusqu'aux cieux, Et leur langue se promène sur la terre.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他們用口褻瀆上天，他們用舌頭毀謗全地。
word.korean: 저희 입은 하늘에 두고 저희 혀는 땅에 두루 다니도다
word.tagalog: Kanilang inilagay ang kanilang bibig sa mga langit, at ang kanilang dila ay lumalakad sa lupa.
word.maori: Tutuki tonu to ratou mangai ki nga rangi: e kopikopiko ana hoki to ratou arero i runga i te whenua.
word.cebuano: Ginapatunong nila ang ilang mga baba ngadto sa kalangitan, Ug ang ilang dila nagasuroy latas sa yuta.
word.hebrew: ט  שתו בשמים פיהם    ולשונם תהלך בארץ
word.hebrewmodern: שתו בשמים פיהם ולשונם תהלך בארץ׃
word.greekot: τὰ σημεῖα ἡμῶν οὐκ εἴδομεν οὐκ ἔστιν ἔτι προφήτης καὶ ἡμᾶς οὐ γνώσεται ἔτι

word.kjv: Whom have I in heaven but thee? and there is none upon earth that I desire beside thee.
word.thailand: นอกจากพระองค์ ข้าพระองค์มิมีผู้ใดในฟ้าสวรรค์ นอกจากพระองค์แล้ว ข้าพระองค์ไม่ปรารถนาผู้ใดในโลก
word.spanish1909: ¿A quién tengo yo en los cielos? Y fuera de ti nada deseo en la tierra.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Chi ho io in cielo fuori di te? E sulla terra non desidero che te.
word.german1912: Wenn ich nur dich habe, so frage ich nichts nach Himmel und Erde.
word.french1910: Quel autre ai-je au ciel que toi! Et sur la terre je ne prends plaisir qu'en toi.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 除你以外，在天上，我還有誰呢？除你以外，在地上，我也無所愛慕。
word.korean: 하늘에서는 주 외에 누가 내게 있리요 땅에서는 주 밖에 나의 사모할 자 없나이다
word.tagalog: Sinong kumakasi sa akin sa langit kundi ikaw? At walang ninanasa ako sa lupa liban sa iyo.
word.maori: Ko wai hoki toku i te rangi ko koe anake? Kahore atu hoki oku i te whenua e hiahia ai, ko koe anake.
word.cebuano: Kinsa may ako sa langit kondili  ikaw da ? Ug walay bisan kinsa dinhi sa ibabaw sa yuta nga akong gitinguha gawas kanimo.
word.hebrew: כה  מי-לי בשמים    ועמך לא-חפצתי בארץ
word.hebrewmodern: מי לי בשמים ועמך לא חפצתי בארץ׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Thou didst cause judgment to be heard from heaven; the earth feared, and was still,
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงลั่นคำพิพากษามาจากฟ้าสวรรค์ แผ่นดินโลกก็กลัวและนิ่งเงียบ
word.spanish1909: Desde los cielos hiciste oir juicio; La tierra tuvo temor y quedó suspensa,
word.latinvulgate: Numquid in æternum projiciet Deus ? aut non apponet ut complacitior sit adhuc ?
word.italian1927: Dal cielo facesti udir la tua sentenza; la terra temette e tacque,
word.german1912: Wenn du das Urteil lässest hören vom Himmel, so erschrickt das Erdreich und wird still,
word.french1910: Du haut des cieux tu as proclamé la sentence; La terre effrayée s'est tenue tranquille,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神啊！你起來施行審判，要拯救地上所有困苦的人。那時，你從天上宣告審判，地上的人就懼怕，並且靜默無聲。（細拉）
word.korean: 주께서 하늘에서 판결을 선포하시매 땅이 두려워 잠잠하였나니
word.tagalog: Iyong ipinarinig ang hatol mula sa langit; ang lupa ay natakot, at tumahimik,
word.maori: Nau i rangona iho ai te whakawa i te rangi: wehi ana te whenua, whakaririka kau ana,
word.cebuano: Gikan sa langit gipadungog mo ang paghukom; Ang yuta nahadlok, ug mihilum,
word.hebrew: ח  אתה נורא אתה--ומי-יעמד לפניך    מאז אפך
word.hebrewmodern: משמים השמעת דין ארץ יראה ושקטה׃
word.greekot: μὴ εἰς τοὺς αἰῶνας ἀπώσεται κύριος καὶ οὐ προσθήσει τοῦ εὐδοκῆσαι ἔτι

word.kjv: The voice of thy thunder was in the heaven: the lightnings lightened the world: the earth trembled and shook.
word.thailand: ฟ้าผ่าของพระองค์มีเสียงอยู่ในฟ้าสวรรค์ ฟ้าแลบทำให้พิภพสว่าง แผ่นดินโลกก็สั่นสะเทือนและหวั่นไหว
word.spanish1909: Anduvo en derredor el sonido de tus truenos; Los relámpagos alumbraron el mundo; Estremecióse y tembló la tierra.
word.latinvulgate: Et tentaverunt Deum in cordibus suis, ut peterent escas animabus suis.
word.italian1927: La voce del tuo tuono era nel turbine; i lampi illuminarono il mondo; la terra fu scossa e tremò.
word.german1912: Es donnerte im Himmel, deine Blitze leuchteten auf dem Erdboden; das Erdreich regte sich und bebte davon.
word.french1910: Ton tonnerre éclata dans le tourbillon, Les éclairs illuminèrent le monde; La terre s'émut et trembla.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你的雷聲在旋風中響起來，閃電照亮了世界，大地戰抖震動。
word.korean: 회리바람 중에 주의 우뢰의 소리가 있으며 번개가 세계를 비취며 땅이 흔들리고 움직였나이다
word.tagalog: Ang tinig ng iyong kulog, ay nasa ipoipo; tinanglawan ng mga kidlat ang sanglibutan: ang lupa ay nayanig at umuga.
word.maori: I roto i te awhiowhio te haruru o tau whatitiri: marama noa te ao i nga uira; wiri ana te whenua, oioi ana.
word.cebuano: Diha sa mga alimpulos ang tingog sa imong dalugdog; Ang mga kilat minghayag sa kalibutan: Ang yuta mikurog ug miuyog.
word.hebrew: יח  זרמו מים עבות--קול נתנו שחקים    אף-חצציך יתהלכו
word.hebrewmodern: קול רעמך בגלגל האירו ברקים תבל רגזה ותרעש הארץ׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἐξεπείρασαν τὸν θεὸν ἐν ταῖς καρδίαις αὐτῶν τοῦ αἰτῆσαι βρώματα ταῖς ψυχαῖς αὐτῶν

word.kjv: Though he had commanded the clouds from above, and opened the doors of heaven,
word.thailand: พระองค์ยังทรงบัญชาเมฆเบื้องบน และทรงเปิดประตูฟ้าสวรรค์
word.spanish1909: A pesar de que mandó á las nubes de arriba, Y abrió las puertas de los cielos,
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: eppure egli comandò alle nuvole di sopra, e aprì le porte del cielo,
word.german1912: Und er gebot den Wolken droben und tat auf die Türen des Himmels
word.french1910: Il commanda aux nuages d'en haut, Et il ouvrit les portes des cieux;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 然而，他吩咐天上的雲彩，打開天上的門戶。
word.korean: 그러나 저가 오히려 위의 궁창을 명하시며 하늘 문을 여시고
word.tagalog: Gayon ma'y nagutos siya sa mga langit sa itaas, at binuksan ang mga pintuan ng langit;
word.maori: Nana nei hoki i whakahau nga kapua i runga, i whakatuwhera nga tatau o te rangi.
word.cebuano: Bisan pa niana, iyang gisugo ang kalangitan sa itaas, Ug gibuksan niya ang mga pultahan sa langit;
word.hebrew: כג  ויצו שחקים ממעל    ודלתי שמים פתח
word.hebrewmodern: ויצו שחקים ממעל ודלתי שמים פתח׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: And had rained down manna upon them to eat, and had given them of the corn of heaven.
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงหลั่งมานาให้เขารับประทาน และทรงประทานอาหารทิพย์ให้เขา
word.spanish1909: E hizo llover sobre ellos maná para comer, Y dióles trigo de los cielos.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: e fece piover su loro manna da mangiare, e dette loro del frumento del cielo.
word.german1912: und ließ das Man auf sie regnen, zu essen, und gab ihnen Himmelsbrot.
word.french1910: Il fit pleuvoir sur eux la manne pour nourriture, Il leur donna le blé du ciel.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他降嗎哪給他們吃，把天上的食物賜給他們。
word.korean: 저희에게 만나를 비같이 내려 먹이시며 하늘 양식으로 주셨나니
word.tagalog: At pinaulanan niya sila ng mana upang makain. At binigyan sila ng trigo ng langit.
word.maori: A whakauaina iho te mana ki runga ki a ratou hei kai; homai ana hoki e ia te witi o te rangi ma ratou.
word.cebuano: Ug iyang gipaulan ang mana aron kan-on nila, Ug naghatag kanila ug makaon gikan sa langit.
word.hebrew: כד  וימטר עליהם מן לאכל    ודגן-שמים נתן למו
word.hebrewmodern: וימטר עליהם מן לאכל ודגן שמים נתן למו׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: He caused an east wind to blow in the heaven: and by his power he brought in the south wind.
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงกระทำให้ลมตะวันออกพัดในฟ้าสวรรค์ และทรงนำลมใต้ออกมาด้วยฤทธิ์ของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Movió el solano en el cielo, Y trajo con su fortaleza el austro.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Fece levare in cielo il vento orientale, e con la sua potenza addusse il vento di mezzodì;
word.german1912: Er ließ wehen den Ostwind unter dem Himmel und erregte durch seine Stärke den Südwind
word.french1910: Il fit souffler dans les cieux le vent d'orient, Et il amena par sa puissance le vent du midi;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他從天空颳起東風，施能力領出南風。
word.korean: 저가 동풍으로 하늘에서 일게 하시며 그 권능으로 남풍을 인도하시고
word.tagalog: Kaniyang pinahihip ang hanging silanganan sa mga langit: at sa pamamagitan ng kaniyang kapangyarihan ay pinatnubayan niya ang hanging timugan.
word.maori: I whakaohokia e ia te marangai i te rangi: i takina ano te tonga e tona kaha.
word.cebuano: Iyang gipahuros ang hangin sa timogan diha sa kalangitan; Ug pinaagi sa iyang gahum iyang gimandoan ang hangin sa habagatan.
word.hebrew: כו  יסע קדים בשמים    וינהג בעזו תימן
word.hebrewmodern: יסע קדים בשמים וינהג בעזו תימן׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: The dead bodies of thy servants have they given to be meat unto the fowls of the heaven, the flesh of thy saints unto the beasts of the earth.
word.thailand: เขาให้ศพผู้รับใช้ของพระองค์เป็นอาหารแก่บรรดานกในอากาศ ให้เนื้อของวิสุทธิชนของพระองค์แก่สัตว์ป่าแห่งแผ่นดินโลก
word.spanish1909: Dieron los cuerpos de tus siervos por comida á las aves de los cielos; La carne de tus santos á las bestias de la tierra.
word.latinvulgate: Qui regis Israël, intende ; qui deducis velut ovem Joseph. Qui sedes super cherubim, manifestare
word.italian1927: hanno dato i cadaveri del tuoi servitori in pasto agli uccelli del cielo, la carne de’ tuoi santi alle fiere della terra.
word.german1912: Sie haben die Leichname deiner Knechte den Vögeln zu fressen gegeben und das Fleisch deiner Heiligen den Tieren im Lande. {~}
word.french1910: Elles ont livré les cadavres de tes serviteurs En pâture aux oiseaux du ciel, La chair de tes fidèles aux bêtes de la terre;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他們把你僕人的屍首，給空中的飛鳥啄食；把你聖民的肉，給地上的野獸吞噬。
word.korean: 저희가 주의 종들의 시체를 공중의 새에게 밥으로 주며 주의 성도들의 육체를 땅 짐승에게 주며
word.tagalog: Ang mga bangkay ng iyong mga lingkod ay ibinigay nila na pagkain sa mga ibon sa himpapawid, ang laman ng iyong mga banal ay sa mga hayop sa lupa.
word.maori: Ko nga tinana mate o au pononga kua hoatu e ratou hei kai ma nga manu o te rangi, ko te kikokiko o tau hunga tapu ma nga kirehe o te whenua.
word.cebuano: Gipakaon nila sa kalanggaman sa kalangitan ang mga lawas nga nangamatay sa imong mga alagad, Ang unod sa imong mga balaan, ngadto sa mga mananap sa yuta.
word.hebrew: ב  נתנו את-נבלת עבדיך--    מאכל לעוף השמים בשר חסידיך    לחיתו-ארץ
word.hebrewmodern: נתנו את נבלת עבדיך מאכל לעוף השמים בשר חסידיך לחיתו ארץ׃
word.greekot: ὁ ποιμαίνων τὸν ισραηλ πρόσχες ὁ ὁδηγῶν ὡσεὶ πρόβατα τὸν ιωσηφ ὁ καθήμενος ἐπὶ τῶν χερουβιν ἐμφάνηθι

word.kjv: Return, we beseech thee, O God of hosts: look down from heaven, and behold, and visit this vine;
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเจ้าจอมโยธา ขอทรงหันกลับเถิด พระเจ้าข้า ขอทรงมองจากฟ้าสวรรค์และทรงเห็น ขอทรงสนพระทัยในเถาองุ่นนี้
word.spanish1909: Oh Dios de los ejércitos, vuelve ahora: Mira desde el cielo, y considera, y visita esta viña,
word.latinvulgate: Si populus meus audisset me, Israël si in viis meis ambulasset,
word.italian1927: O Dio degli eserciti, deh, ritorna; riguarda dal cielo, e vedi, e visita questa vigna;
word.german1912: Gott Zebaoth, wende dich doch, schaue vom Himmel und sieh an und suche heim diesen Weinstock
word.french1910: Dieu des armées, reviens donc! Regarde du haut des cieux, et vois! considère cette vigne!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 萬軍的　神啊！求你回心轉意，從天上垂看鑒察，眷顧這葡萄樹，
word.korean: 주의 오른손으로 심으신 줄기요 주를 위하여 힘있게 하신 가지니이다
word.tagalog: Bumalik ka uli, isinasamo ko sa iyo, Oh Dios ng mga hukbo: tumungo ka mula sa langit, at iyong masdan, at dalawin mo ang puno ng ubas na ito,
word.maori: Tahuri mai ano, e te Atua o nga mano, e inoi atu nei matou: titiro iho i te rangi, kia kite mai koe, ka toro mai i tenei waina.
word.cebuano: Bumalik ka, nagahangyo kami kanimo, Oh Dios sa mga panon. Sud-onga gikan sa langit, ug tanawa, ug du-awa kining parrasa,
word.hebrew: יד  יכרסמנה חזיר מיער    וזיז שדי ירענה
word.hebrewmodern: אלהים צבאות שוב נא הבט משמים וראה ופקד גפן זאת׃
word.greekot: εἰ ὁ λαός μου ἤκουσέν μου ισραηλ ταῖς ὁδοῖς μου εἰ ἐπορεύθη

word.kjv: Truth shall spring out of the earth; and righteousness shall look down from heaven.
word.thailand: ความจริงจะงอกขึ้นมาจากแผ่นดิน และความชอบธรรมจะมองลงมาจากฟ้าสวรรค์
word.spanish1909: La verdad brotará de la tierra; Y la justicia mirará desde los cielos.
word.latinvulgate: Deduc me, Domine, in via tua, et ingrediar in veritate tua ; lætetur cor meum, ut timeat nomen tuum.
word.italian1927: La verità germoglia dalla terra, e la giustizia riguarda dal cielo.
word.german1912: daß Treue auf der Erde wachse und Gerechtigkeit vom Himmel schaue;
word.french1910: La fidélité germe de la terre, Et la justice regarde du haut des cieux.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 信實從地上生出，公義從天上俯視。
word.korean: 진리는 땅에서 솟아나고 의는 하늘에서 하감하였도다
word.tagalog: Katotohanan ay bumubukal sa lupa; at ang katuwiran ay tumungo mula sa langit.
word.maori: Ka tupu ake te pono i te whenua, a ka titiro iho te tika i te rangi.
word.cebuano: Ang kamatuoran mogitib gikan sa yuta; Ug ang pagkamatarung magasudong gikan sa langit;
word.hebrew: יא  חסד-ואמת נפגשו    צדק ושלום נשקו
word.hebrewmodern: אמת מארץ תצמח וצדק משמים נשקף׃
word.greekot: ὁδήγησόν με κύριε τῇ ὁδῷ σου καὶ πορεύσομαι ἐν τῇ ἀληθείᾳ σου εὐφρανθήτω ἡ καρδία μου τοῦ φοβεῖσθαι τὸ ὄνομά σου

word.kjv: For I have said, Mercy shall be built up for ever: thy faithfulness shalt thou establish in the very heavens.
word.thailand: ด้วยข้าพระองค์ได้กล่าวแล้วว่า "ความเมตตาจะตั้งอยู่เป็นนิตย์ พระองค์จะสถาปนาความสัตย์สุจริตของพระองค์ในฟ้าสวรรค์ทีเดียว"
word.spanish1909: Porque dije: Para siempre será edificada misericordia; En los mismos cielos apoyarás tu verdad.
word.latinvulgate: Priusquam montes fierent, aut formaretur terra et orbis, a sæculo et usque in sæculum tu es Deus.
word.italian1927: Poiché ho detto: La tua benignità sarà stabile in eterno; nei cieli stessi tu stabilisci la tua fedeltà.
word.german1912: und sage also: Daß eine ewige Gnade wird aufgehen, und du wirst deine Wahrheit treulich halten im Himmel.
word.french1910: Car je dis: La bonté a des fondements éternels; Tu établis ta fidélité dans les cieux.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我要說：“你的慈愛必永遠建立；你的信實，你必堅立在天上。
word.korean: 내가 말하기를 인자하심을 영원히 세우시며 주의 성실하심을 하늘에서 견고히 하시리라 하였나이다
word.tagalog: Sapagka't aking sinabi, Kaawaan ay matatayo magpakailan man: ang pagtatapat mo'y iyong itatatag sa mga kalangitlangitan.
word.maori: I mea hoki ahau, Ka hanga ake te mahi tohu mo ake tonu atu: ka whakapumautia e koe tou pono ki nga tino rangi ra ano.
word.cebuano: Kay miingon ako: Ang kalooy pagatukoron sa walay katapusan; Sa maong mga kalangitan ang imong pagkamatinumanon igapahamutang.
word.hebrew: ב  חסדי יהוה עולם אשירה    לדר ודר אודיע אמונתך בפי
word.hebrewmodern: כי אמרתי עולם חסד יבנה שמים תכן אמונתך בהם׃
word.greekot: πρὸ τοῦ ὄρη γενηθῆναι καὶ πλασθῆναι τὴν γῆν καὶ τὴν οἰκουμένην καὶ ἀπὸ τοῦ αἰῶνος ἕως τοῦ αἰῶνος σὺ εἶ

word.kjv: And the heavens shall praise thy wonders, O LORD: thy faithfulness also in the congregation of the saints.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ ฟ้าสวรรค์จะสรรเสริญการมหัศจรรย์ของพระองค์ และสรรเสริญความสัตย์สุจริตของพระองค์ในที่ประชุมของบรรดาวิสุทธิชนด้วย
word.spanish1909: Y celebrarán los cielos tu maravilla, oh Jehová; Tu verdad también en la congregación de los santos.
word.latinvulgate: quæ pro nihilo habentur eorum anni erunt.
word.italian1927: Anche i cieli celebrano le tue maraviglie, o Eterno, e la tua fedeltà nell’assemblea dei santi.
word.german1912: Und die Himmel werden, HERR, deine Wunder preisen und deine Wahrheit in der Gemeinde der Heiligen.
word.french1910: Les cieux célèbrent tes merveilles, ô Eternel! Et ta fidélité dans l'assemblée des saints.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華啊！諸天要稱頌你的奇事；在聖者的會中，你的信實也要被稱頌。
word.korean: 여호와여, 주의 기사를 하늘이 찬양할 것이요 주의 성실도 거룩한 자의 회중에서 찬양하리이다
word.tagalog: At pupurihin ng langit ang iyong mga kababalaghan, Oh Panginoon; ang pagtatapat mo naman sa kapulungan ng mga banal.
word.maori: ¶ Ka whakamoemiti ano nga rangi, e Ihowa, ki au mahi whakamiharo; ki tou pono hoki i roto i te whakaminenga o te hunga tapu.
word.cebuano: Ug ang kalangitan magadayeg sa imong mga katingalahan, Oh Jehova; Ang imong pagkamatinumanon usab diha sa katilingban sa mga balaan.
word.hebrew: ה  עד-עולם אכין זרעך    ובניתי לדר-ודור כסאך סלה
word.hebrewmodern: ויודו שמים פלאך יהוה אף אמונתך בקהל קדשים׃
word.greekot: τὰ ἐξουδενώματα αὐτῶν ἔτη ἔσονται τὸ πρωὶ ὡσεὶ χλόη παρέλθοι

word.kjv: For who in the heaven can be compared unto the LORD? who among the sons of the mighty can be likened unto the LORD?
word.thailand: เพราะผู้ใดเล่าที่ในฟ้าจะเปรียบกับพระเยโฮวาห์ได้ ในบรรดาลูกหลานของผู้มีอำนาจผู้ใดจะเหมือนพระเยโฮวาห์
word.spanish1909: Porque ¿quién en los cielos se igualará con Jehová? ¿Quién será semejante á Jehová entre los hijos de los potentados?
word.latinvulgate: Mane sicut herba transeat ; mane floreat, et transeat ; vespere decidat, induret, et arescat.
word.italian1927: Poiché chi, nei cieli, è paragonabile all’Eterno? Chi è simile all’Eterno tra i figli di Dio?
word.german1912: Denn wer mag in den Wolken dem HERRN gleich gelten, und gleich sein unter den Kindern Gottes dem HERRN?
word.french1910: Car qui, dans le ciel, peut se comparer à l'Eternel? Qui est semblable à toi parmi les fils de Dieu?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 在天上，誰能和耶和華相比呢？在全能者的眾子中，誰能像耶和華呢？
word.korean: 대저 궁창에서 능히 여호와와 비교할 자 누구며 권능 있는 자 중에 여호와와 같은 자 누구리이까 ?
word.tagalog: Sapagka't sino sa langit ang maitutulad sa Panginoon? Sino sa gitna ng mga anak ng makapangyarihan ang gaya ng Panginoon,
word.maori: Ko wai oti i nga rangi hei rite mo Ihowa? Ko wai i roto i nga tama a te hunga nunui e rite ana ki a Ihowa?
word.cebuano: Kay kinsa man sa mga langit ang ikagtanding kang Jehova? Kinsa sa taliwala sa mga anak sa mga gamhanan nga makasama kang Jehova?
word.hebrew: ו  ויודו שמים פלאך יהוה    אף-אמונתך בקהל קדשים
word.hebrewmodern: כי מי בשחק יערך ליהוה ידמה ליהוה בבני אלים׃
word.greekot: τὸ πρωὶ ἀνθήσαι καὶ παρέλθοι τὸ ἑσπέρας ἀποπέσοι σκληρυνθείη καὶ ξηρανθείη

word.kjv: The heavens are thine, the earth also is thine: as for the world and the fulness thereof, thou hast founded them.
word.thailand: ฟ้าสวรรค์เป็นของพระองค์ แผ่นดินโลกเป็นของพระองค์ด้วย พระองค์ได้ทรงตั้งพิภพและบรรดาสิ่งที่อยู่ในนั้น
word.spanish1909: Tuyos los cielos, tuya también la tierra: El mundo y su plenitud, tú lo fundaste.
word.latinvulgate: Quis novit potestatem iræ tuæ,
word.italian1927: I cieli son tuoi, tua pure è la terra; tu hai fondato il mondo e tutto ciò ch’è in esso.
word.german1912: Himmel und Erde ist dein; du hast gegründet den Erdboden und was darinnen ist.
word.french1910: C'est à toi qu'appartiennent les cieux et la terre, C'est toi qui as fondé le monde et ce qu'il renferme.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 天是你的，地也是你的；世界和世界充滿的，都是你建立的。
word.korean: 하늘이 주의 것이요 땅도 주의 것이라 세계와 그 중에 충만한 것을 주께서 건설하셨나이다
word.tagalog: Ang langit ay iyo, ang lupa ay iyo rin: ang sanglibutan at ang buong narito ay iyong itinatag,
word.maori: Nau nga rangi, nau te whenua: te ao me ona mea e hua ana i runga, nau ena i pumau ai.
word.cebuano: Ang mga kalangitan imo man, ang yuta usab imo man: Ang kalibutan ug ang kahupnganan niana, imong gitukod sila.
word.hebrew: יא  אתה דכאת כחלל רהב    בזרוע עזך פזרת אויביך
word.hebrewmodern: לך שמים אף לך ארץ תבל ומלאה אתה יסדתם׃
word.greekot: τίς γινώσκει τὸ κράτος τῆς ὀργῆς σου καὶ ἀπὸ τοῦ φόβου σου τὸν θυμόν σου

word.kjv: His seed also will I make to endure for ever, and his throne as the days of heaven.
word.thailand: เราจะสถาปนาเชื้อสายของเขาไว้เป็นนิตย์ ทั้งบัลลังก์ของเขาให้ดำรงตราบเท่ากาลของฟ้าสวรรค์
word.spanish1909: Y pondré su simiente para siempre, Y su trono como los días de los cielos.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Io renderò la sua progenie eterna, e il suo trono simile ai giorni de’ cieli.
word.german1912: Ich will ihm ewiglich Samen geben und seinen Stuhl, solange der Himmel währt, erhalten.
word.french1910: Je rendrai sa postérité éternelle, Et son trône comme les jours des cieux.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我要使他的後裔存到永遠，使他的王位好像天一樣長久。
word.korean: 또 그 후손을 영구케 하여 그 위를 하늘의 날과 같게 하리로다
word.tagalog: Ang kaniya namang binhi ay pananatilihin ko magpakailan man, at ang luklukan niya'y parang mga araw ng langit.
word.maori: Ka meinga hoki e ahau ona uri kia mau tonu ake ake, tona torona ano ko nga ra o te rangi.
word.cebuano: Ug ang iyang kaliwat usab himoon ko nga magapadayon sa walay katapusan, Ug ang iyang trono ingon sa mga adlaw sa langit.
word.hebrew: כט  לעולם אשמור- (אשמר-) לו חסדי    ובריתי נאמנת לו
word.hebrewmodern: ושמתי לעד זרעו וכסאו כימי שמים׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: It shall be established for ever as the moon, and as a faithful witness in heaven. Selah.
word.thailand: จะสถาปนาไว้อย่างดวงจันทร์เป็นนิตย์ และเหมือนสักขีพยานอันสัตย์ซื่อในท้องฟ้า" เซลาห์
